name: The Residence Tunis
description: Set along the Mediterranean coastline, this luxury beachfront hotel boasting 161 rooms and 9 suites reflects the distinctive style of Arab-Andalusian architecture; combining palatial space with an intimate ambience which has welcomed diplomats and dignitaries from all over the world. Located just 20 minutes from Tunis-Carthage International Airport, it presents the perfect location for visiting the city’s treasures and UNESCO World Heritage sites such as the Archaeological Site of Carthage and The Medina of Tunis, as well as Sidi Bou Said, a picturesque sea-side town known for its blue and white houses and cobbled streets, with al-fresco cafes and art galleries, located just minutes away from the hotel. Discover a world of flavours at its five seasonal restaurants offering cuisine from across the globe, ranging from the Mediterranean, traditional Tunisian at El Dar, to Chinese at the Li Bai, all in different atmospheric locations throughout the resort. Renowned for its award-winning spa, The Spa & Thalasso ; a 4,000m2 wellness centre inspired by the magical atmosphere of ancient Roman thermal baths, with 18 treatment rooms featuring an oriental hammam and a majestic cupola covering an indoor seawater swimming pool. There is a large outdoor swimming pool and restaurant, a beachfront refreshment bar and two floodlit tennis courts and the Dolphin Kids Club for younger guests, with the star attraction being the hotel’s 18-hole, par 72 golf course designed by Robert Trent Jones II.Read more

Room 306- ocean view Nice size room with king bed.  Tub and shower separate.  Safe, mini fridge - not cold.  A/C works great.  Water pressure in shower very good.  Carrefour (grocery store) next door in a small mall.  The mall also has ATM and a bank.  Not many power outlets.   One power strip on desk with an adapter.  Nice pool and beach.  Reception staff very friendly.  At the lobby bar, Mahrez was amazing and helpful.  Also a shout out to Khaled in the breakfast dining room.  Knew my coffee order and brought it to me every morning.  The reason I gave four stars out of five, are the on site restaurants.  If you like fish/seafood, you’ll be very happy.  For those of us that are vegetarian, not many good choices.  I felt the menu in the lobby bar had more choices at better prices.  Not within walking distance to the Medina,  The hotel arrange for a taxi to drive us and wait for us.  Overall, a pleasant stay.

name: Movenpick Resort & Marine Spa Sousse
description: LOCATION The Movenpick Resort & Marine Spa Sousse is located at the entertainment heart of Sousse, and just minutes away from the city centre. Opened in April 2010, this luxury 5 star resort is the first International chain resort in the city of Sousse. The hotel comprises of 618 rooms and suites of various categories. Sousse is Tunisia’s third largest city, and an important industrial and commercial centre on the eastern coast. Sousse is located 135 km south of Tunis, 20 km north of Monastir airport, and just 40 km south of Enfidha airport. In addition to being the Sahel region’s economic heart, Sousse is also a major tourist resort area, offering a wide choice of restaurant and entertainment options. ACCOMMODATION A total of 618 rooms and suites, well equipped with flat screen LCD TV, direct dial telephones, mini bars, safe deposit boxes, coffee and tea-making facilities and individually controllable air conditioning and heating. All rooms are granted free access to the underground car park, the gym and the outdoor swimming pools. Non-smoking rooms are available, as well as connecting rooms for families with children. Two rooms are customized for the disabled. The top floor is also known as the Executive floor, offering complimentary Internet access and other services for the discerning business guest. DINING & ENTERTAINMENT The Movenpick Resort & Marine Spa Sousse offers a diversity of cuisines from around the world to tantalize your taste buds; enjoy show cooking and international buffets at Mosaique, indulge in Sushi and Teppanyaki from Japan at Sendai, sample authentic Spanish cuisine at Tapeo or enjoy a Mediterranean culinary experience at La Villa. And if it’s grill you favour, the Levant Grill & Jacuzzi is the ideal place to dine by the water’s edge. Watch the sun go down with a drink from a variety of bars such as the Breeze or First. Aga Cafe takes you back to the glorious days of the Ottoman Empire. And for a more lively end to the day, La Villa offers different atmospheres, ranging from the brandy and cigars of the Chimney Bar to the eased back elegance of the Onyx Lounge. SPORT & LEISURE With its 300-metre long sandy beach and a watersports base offering hobiecat sailboats, parascending and windsurfing, the Movenpick Resort & Marine Spa Sousse is the ideal sports and leisure resort. Other sport and leisure facilities also include beach volleyball, table tennis, sauna and fitness training. For golf enthusiasts, El Kantaoui golf course offers an 18-hole golf course in the immediate vicinity. A scuba diving club is also located nearby. Other amenities in the hotel include three outdoor swimming pools, one indoor/outdoor pool at the Marine Spa, the VIKs’ (Very Important Kids) house, a beauty salon, a boutique and business services. MARINE SPA Marine Spa is our unique interpretation of wellbeing: a full thalassotherapy centre combined with a large array of Spa treatments. Marine Spa welcomes both hotel and outside guests from 10.00 am till 10.00 pm daily, offering them a unique concept that gives its true meaning to wellness. Harnessing the power of natural marine ingredients, together with the latest innovations in product and treatment technology, we offer a complete package for all your spa and wellness needs. Under the guidance of our expert Spa therapists, we encourage our guests to actively participate in the selection and creation of a personalised spa programme. MEETINGS & EVENTS Perfection is our passion and Swiss hospitality our heritage. Movenpick Meetings & Events offers professional event management encapsulating the highest quality standards, creative cuisine and qualified, friendly service. You will find in Sousse this subtle alliance of efficiency and inspiration, of modernity and functionality, in each of our five meeting spaces. We offer one 629 sqm ballroom and four meeting rooms with daylight. All include state-of-the-art equipment and can be set up in a variety of styles. Need anything on the fly? Our dedicated Meetings & Events Concierge is there to cater for your needs and to ensure that your event is running smoothly. This enables you to focus your full attention on your meeting or event. Our excellent quality programme, Movenpick Meeting & Events, creates the optimal conditions to ensure that your meeting, banquet or business event will be a complete success. Your personal contact partner will take over the entire organization for you, ensuring highest quality service and attending to the individual needs of your guests.Read more

An excellent hotel,we stayed for a week in mid-May and found the room of a good size with a nice view and very well kept by the very friendly housekeeping staff. No complaints there. The hotel itself is clean,the staff are friendly and professional,food was excellent although the buffet restaurant gets very crowded at times. We didn't use the pool as it was too busy/noisy for us but it was well attended and the animation team must be commended for their efforts there. Loungers were good quality and looked comfortable. This is a hotel favoured mainly by French tourists,we were one of very few English/British travellers but we encountered no issues and only a minor language barrier and we had a relaxing week with no issues.  The only thing that would stop us returning (and this hotel is VERY good value for money) is the state of the beach beyond the hotel area. We recovered glass,fragments of roof tiles,building materials,clothing,footwear and endless amounts of plastic. In all of my travels I've never seen so much plastic on a beach. From an environmental point of view it is horrendous, we are not eco-warriors but we care about the sea and the environment surrounding it. This really needs addressing,we've never seen anything like it and over miles of beach it was a similar story all along (this does not at all reflect on the hotel which is well maintained). Otherwise if you like a pool-based holiday in a nice place we would highly recommend here.

HEAT!!!!!. Let’s not forget the shop in front of the hotel, great choices and correct prices. We will return without any problem. We recommend it 1000 times. Thank you for the Mother's Day rose when we left.  Sylvie, Noémie and Remi

Great hotel, the all-inclusive is quality (generous cocktail and quality buffet) The animation team at the top thank you Junior for his energy! Activities offered in top thank you to Ahmed Azem. Only downside: no dispenser in the hotel and the shower is sometimes cold and lacks flow.

We spent a pleasant week in this hotel for the first time , the room was very nice sea view thanks to our maid I forgot her name , the food was very good and varied especially during the Tunisian evening, the staff was at the top a very good mention to mario the entertainment chef and his team. We'll be back in September.

What an unforgettable stay at Hotel Télémaque Djerba! We were absolutely delighted with our experience. The room was impeccable, impeccable cleanliness, which is always very appreciable. As for the food, it was simply excellent, varied and delicious with each meal. A big congratulations to the waiters for their professionalism and kindness, always with little care. But the highlight of our stay was undoubtedly the animation team. A huge thank you to the animators and their manager Foued for setting an incredible atmosphere and for giving us a smile from the beginning to the end of our holiday. Their energy and good humor are contagious! We leave with wonderful memories and the desire to return very quickly.

reviews.review_title: A perfect stay at the hotel
reviews.review_text: Telemachus: conviviality, flavors and atmosphere at the top! "We had an absolutely charming stay at the Hotel Télémaque. One of the aspects we enjoyed most is its human size, which creates a friendly and relaxed atmosphere. You feel comfortable right now! The food was excellent and varied, a real pleasure for the taste buds. Whether at the main restaurant or at the other food outlets, we have always found tasty dishes. A big congratulations to the animation team! Always smiling and full of energy, she has managed to punctuate our days and evenings with entertaining activities adapted to all ages. The Hotel Télémaque is really a beautiful address in Djerba for those looking for an authentic, warm and quality stay. We highly recommend it!"

Loyal guests since 2010 of the Telemaque for its family atmosphere; have always been very satisfied with the services of the hotel and all its staff; are shocked by the inappropriate comment regarding Abdelrhazak's very helpful waiter and a great correction as well as his colleague incriminated. We will be back with pleasure!

Everything is impeccable; hotel ,sea view rooms ,place of the hotel ,clean beach as well as small staff,animators ,everyone s restaurants!!! care to best meet customer requirements  This hotel almost deserves 5 stars.

Very good stay at the Telemachus, staff of incomparable kindness, thanks to Sonia, Hamida, Monem (reception), Samira (maid) for their availability and to all the staff.  However, I did not appreciate the inappropriate comments from Abdel (bar) and Abd Lzaak who has no respect for the waiters who do an admirable job.  Various and very good food. I'd be happy to come back for a fourth time.

We spent a week with friends in this hotel, we are delighted with our stay. The hotel is very clean and well eaten. The animation team is very friendly. The staff is at your disposal. I also wanted to mention the hair salon that does not appear on the site, I was lucky to get my hair done by the nice and lovely Rafida ❤️🍹 who knows her work which offers you a service panel for a beautiful beauty. I have tested the hairstyle and am absolutely delighted with the service. She is very professional in her field. Don’t wait to go there she is very good advice

A superb hotel with very nice staff and care. Activities every day with superb animators (little nod to Junior, Blacky, Yaya and choco who are at the top)  The hotel really has everything you need such as shop, exchange and beauty salon, which I advise to go there because the staff is adorable. We had a great holiday with my partner.  The only problem in my opinion is that the mattress in the room is extremely hard, it gave me back pain and it lacked the name of the dishes we eat.

Excellent stay at the Hotel Telemaque!!! A warm welcome characteristic of Tunisians! All the staff are very attentive to their clients: the receptionist is exceptional! Special mention to the very professional and friendly animation team: Fouad, Yaya, Junior, Blacky, Marcello Thank you for brightening up our stay!!!! A very nice experience! I highly recommend!!!!! Ahlem, Basma, Ines and their mom ☺️

Magnificent hotel with its private beach white sand turquoise waters mohamed the beach owner is adorable sonia the receptionist is very professional and responsive the must stay the restaurant I have never eaten so well in Tunisia fresh grilled fish every day huge choice of food a big thank you to all this team I had a great holiday go there with your eyes closed

We return from a week from May 15 to 22, 2025. We had booked for the 2nd time at the Telemaque and will return with great pleasure in September. Hotel very clean varied buffet all the staff is of great kindness always smiling and available. Welcome to the top with Sonia always smiling and professional and a big thank you to Zohra our maid who made us every day a little decoration and a nickel room. The correspondent Fram on site is attentive and tries to do his utmost to satisfy us. Thank you all and look forward to seeing you again in September

reviews.review_title: A relaxing week in all inclusive!
reviews.review_text: We spent a very good week at the Hotel Telemaque.  The kindness and good humor of the professionals is indisputable. We were able to relax while enjoying the daily entertainment (a good balance of calm time / entertainment). The hotel is very well located on the beach and well maintained. As mentioned in some comments, the areas of improvement we note would be the labelling of the different buffets and better quality of wifi in the rooms.  Very good continuation to the teams and maybe soon,  Léa, Erwan & Paola

Very good hotel on Djerba, right next to the beach, with great animation, thank you to blacky and junior! Very welcome, very good restaurant. Comfortable bedding! A very good stay, we will come back with pleasure! 😊 Thanks to momo the beach attendant Bashir at the bar ,kayes for our room always nickel in short thank you to the whole team at the top change nothing!

We had a wonderful stay at the Telemachus.  An animation team at the top, we did not have time to be bored.  The staff (cleaning lady, waiters...etc) sound impeccable kindness and do a quality job.   We will be back with great pleasure.  Thank you to the whole Telemachus team.   CHAAAALEUUUR🔥🔥🔥🔥

Excellent stay hotel restaurant pool everything is spotless  The staff nothing to say of a kindness An animation of ottoman we never get bored the animators are at the top show every night music dance  Strongly the month of October  Too eager

name: Medina Belisaire & Thalasso
description: The hotel lies directly Hammamet - Yasmine (Tunisia) and just 200 m from the beautiful sandy beach. Family-friendly complex. Lively entertainment program. Just 5 km from two golf courses. Thalasso - therapy centre with different treatments. Certified Travelife: Committed to sustainable practices for a greener, responsible stay.Read more
property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

reviews.review_title: Lovely hotel. Few issues but overall good
reviews.review_text: First time at this hotel. Firstly there's no bell boy to take your cases in to the hotel so we struggled as had 30 kilos each. And it's large cobbles. Animation brilliant. Had lots of fun with them. Loved each and every one of them  Rooms small. Food good but often cold and fridges inadequate because you could literally pour the margerine on your rolls. No loaves of bread provided unfortunately which is a shame. Staff great. Loved bar waiter in evenings.  Never waited for a drink. Men's toilets were often flooded and out of order. You definitely need an extension lead as only 2 sockets ( one was for the lamp). Had to ask for kettle twice, then weren't given cups so had to get them from bar. No tea or coffee provided but we took our own. Beach towels ok but small. I bought one from a shop. Overall if these issues were ironed out I'd definitely return because the Animation and staff were absolutely brilliant.

Great hotel. I thank very much the host Lamia who always smiles and exceptional kindness.  We had a wonderful stay thanks to Lamia who is always available and answers all our questions. So a big thank you we'll come back

Would really recommend staying at this hotel. All the staff are really friendly without exception! All of the animation team took the time to speak to us which we haven't experienced before. Entertainment was always fun of a night. The location is a bit out of the way but no problems in getting a taxi if you don't want to walk. There is a good choice of food available. The rooms are a bit dated but are spacious. What sets the hotel apart for us were the staff though.

We have a pleasant stay in a well located hotel close to the sea.Very good personal welcome to listen to and care.The service of the bar listening fast and efficient.Moreover the food very good and the room very clean.The team of animation are great who offers us a varied and very rich program with a superb woman named Vicky who is to many listening and who looks after us.Hotel recommended.

Beautiful hotel! Impeccable service - perfect staff - impeccable cleanliness restaurant very varied and very good  A very good address! We will return without hesitation  Thank you to all the staff and despite a reservation concern on our arrival forget about  l agency the management was understanding and very human Very good location  Nothing negative thank you so much and see you soon

Loved this  hotel . rooms v clean bit dated entertainment staff fantastic shout out to Aemon  Harry  & Vicky so nice . food very good always found somthing to eat apart from the confrence night was awful  so busy and lots rude guests. waiters realy good luved Hosin  always found us a table .bar staff realy good . short walk to beach did enjoy archery and darts games .

I’ve just got back from an amazing week everything was just top class entertainment lads and lasses were just brilliant I really cannot fault staff at all just couldn’t do enough for you food was lovely drinks and cocktails brill private beach is only five minute walk from hotel and bar and toilets all spotless

reviews.review_title: Really nice place and worth a visit!
reviews.review_text: Got back today after our second time there. Some of the best service from all of the staff we've ever had in a four star. In fact the service just might outweigh some five star hotels we've been to. Everyone's very helpful and friendly and cant do enough for you. Superb cleanliness.   Good quality rooms, if a little dated, but in reality that's not a problem. All you do is sleep there. As I think has been mentioned before there's a lack of wall sockets so take a few adaptors if you have a lot of rechargeable stuff etc. Have to say that the large bowl of fruit and the towels on the bed every day as swans with petals etc was a great touch.  Fantastic animation team (Vicky is a real bonus) and some good acts as well. Bloke on the violin was stand-out! Bar staff are brilliant too. One failure though was one night the act due in the bar was moved to another room leaving those in the bar with out anything. Some music would have been good.  Be aware its quite geared towards French Tour Operators so don't expect lots of British there. Guess what? They don't bite!  If you're a fussy eater like me you might struggle with the food but I can honestly say the quality improving and I found something most nights.  If there's something to change/improve on its the meal arrangements when there's a seminar or a locals event happening. We were there last weekend and the restaurant was complete pandemonium and a free for all. If your a paying tourist and not forceful, and I mean 'forceful', you wont get near anything.  I have to say sadly that I've never seen so many people take so much when clearly needing so little. You don't need four plates of food per person, fruit, ice cream, cake, bread etc between two of you only to leave your table looking like a rubbish tip with uneaten food everywhere for the poor staff to clear up. Might want to give some thought to using another room for those that are not paying tourists.  So my advice is definitely book this hotel as the pros definitely outweigh the cons. We'll surely be back this year or next!

Very good hotel! Staff (host, waiter, reception, )very welcoming and friendly  The restaurant is very good,  The hotel is very clean. Animation is varied  The all in exclusive formula is complete and 24h / 24h A quiet pool and a lively pool.  The sea has quick access with private beach bar and toilet.

Super nice place, the staff absolutely friendly and accommodating.  Food was mega delicious and really something for every man.  The kids had a lot of fun by the pool, were very excited about the show and the animators ❤️🍀 Gladly again

Best hotel ever in Hammamet !!! Great service, friendly staff, great food and great animation. Non-intrusive, very respectful and with a lot of humor 😀 The rooms are nice and clean and it is responded to wishes of any kind. For old and young, with or without children highly recommended !!!

In a year, we came 3 times, and the observation is the same: it’s always perfect! The staff is always welcoming, kind and caring for us.  The animation team offers various activities (archery, sports, games...). The restaurant is spotless.  Really the positive: the staff (animators, waiters, chef, bartenders,.....). We will return a 4th time without hesitation!

A great animation team at the top An incredible atmosphere. They are all very present, smiling, kind and all make us feel good. Thank you A very clean complex , a restaurant at the top. The staff is really careful. I will return without hesitation.

reviews.review_title: Relaxing stay. Very very good welcome
reviews.review_text: Very good hotel. The welcome is perfect and the animation team is great.  I'll be back. I strongly recommend it for families.  The entertainment is great. Bravo.  We eat very well. And it is not very expensive.  Thank you thank you

Our second visit to this great hotel and little has changed in a year. As per my last review, it was a very great stay. The welcome was warm and genuine. Being an all inclusive holiday the food and drink are crucial to a good holiday and this hotel did not disappoint, the variety and abundance of dishes meant you can find something for all. Traditional, familiar all tasty and beautifully presented.  Although I don’t indulge in alcohol much these days the few I had were very good. Mainly locally brands.  Lifeguards at pools at all times and never a need for towels at dawn to get a sunbed The entertainment team are busy, energetic but not pushy. Many activities to join should you wish Our room was great, large, with a small balcony. By far the best quality were the staff, all levels were cheerful and friendly and very hardworking. A tribute.  Not as polished as maybe Spain, Greece, France, etc. if that’s your bag, Tunisia has had a rough ride for many years, but the best value you’ll find anywhere and the people inside the hotel and out are simply lovely.  A very safe and comfortable feel to the area I highly recommend this hotel

A family hotel whose service is at the top personal listening and care 😃. Well varied and good food. Clean room a very nice atmosphere with an animation team present and dynamic. Everything and top .hotel to recommend

name: Steigenberger Marhaba Thalasso
description: Discover the elegant charm of the Steigenberger Marhaba Thalasso, a Mediterranean oasis nestled in Hammamet Sud. Located just 6 km from the Hammamet medina and 48 km from Enfidha-Hammamet international airport, our hotel combines serene relaxation with easy access to local attractions. With 153 elegant rooms, 17 suites and 201 bungalows, each accommodation is carefully designed to offer optimum comfort. Guests can enjoy private balconies, flat-screen TVs, minibars, free Wi-Fi and tea and coffee-making facilities. Surrounded by lush, spacious gardens, the hotel offers a peaceful setting ideal for an invigorating getaway. Don't forget to relax and rejuvenate in our two outdoor pools, one with freshwater and the other with sea water.Read more
property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

reviews.review_text: Great hotel with fantastic staff. Food was great and dome good choices. My son had a special calzone made for him by the pizza chef. The breakfast omlettes have to be tried and the omelette chef is great. Pancakes with the chocolate sauce are delicious. There's a brilliant desert selection including ice cream and lots of fresh fruit. The barstaff are great and once they know you they bring your drinks to you. The lobby is huge and great for sitting in. We stayed in a bungalow. But would rather have chosen staying in the hotel itself. Highly recommend this hotel.

reviews.review_title: A hotel where tourists are stolen from
reviews.review_text: We are now in Steigenberger Palace MARHABA and it's the second day in a row that our beach towels are stolen from the sun loungers. The receptionists don't care. A hotel where people steal. Be careful to avoid it because no one guarantees your integrity. I don't recommend it at all. A place where people's indolence ruins your vacation

Great hotel, entertainment staff are excellent (especially Rita in the kid’s club)! Lots going on in the evening and the food is good. We really enjoyed the Fantasia show and there were other themed nights. Would recommend coming here - we already want to book our next trip!

reviews.review_title: First Time at this hotel.... Won't be the last.....
reviews.review_text: I booked for me and my partner as neither of us had been to Tunisia before.  What a fab hotel!!!!  All the staff are happy and smiling and are so friendly, nothing is too much trouble.  The lobby is great with a cash machine and welcome drinks.  Check in was fast and stress free, they have currency exchange too as its a closed currency.  You can pay the pool towel deposit in sterling so you don't have to worry about being left with Dinar at the end of your stay.  There is a small shop that has very reasonable prices.  A really massive shout out to the guys at the pool bar and the pool guards and sunbed guys, you made our holiday 'Very Gooood Very Niiice'.  I hope the ducks are living their best lives and I hope the  get to see this.  The pool and surrounding gardens are spotlessly clean.  An absolutely fantastic bunch of guys, so much so that we didn't go to the other pool......   We had a bungalow with garden view (214), our maid was so friendly and always smiling, the beds were made every day and changed whenever we requested, fresh towels every day, the room was spotlessly clean.  Mini fridge was stocked with water and soft drinks and there is shampoo, shower gel, hand soap and body lotion provided and a pretty decent hairdryer.  There are also dressing gowns and slippers provided.  We ate all our meals in the main restaurant we were so happy with the food choices and freshness.  The dishes were not repeated over and over like in some all -inclusives, its was presented fantastically and there was something for everyone.  A huge thank you to Ben the guys up around table 84, you made us feel so welcome and made it feel more than a hotel dining room.  Even though it could be very bust at times they were all smiling and we never had to ask for drinks, they appeared as if by magic!!  The staff here really make the place fantastic.  Thank you for a truly fantastic holiday!!  My partner never likes to go to the same place twice but he has already said he would definitely return here, so you may just see us again very soon (September.....)

The best hotel in Tunisia. Lovely stuff in whole hotel and best entertainment team. We will come back for sure, because these people are amazing. They made us smile every day and we enjoyed our stay. People are very kind and professional. All recommendations for the hotel and stuff.

Really a great team as the hotel service to the animators.    O top really recommend this hotel 100%. Excellent food not to mention cleanliness. I don't blame you. A big bravooo. Very professional facilitators

Great family holiday in a beautiful hotel with a great environment. A big thank you especially to Rita who took care of the children with patience and love, we see that she loves what she does and is very caring. Thanks also to Hafidh who was very attentive during our stay.

We spent very good time :-) We were a big group and everyone found something very interesting for him! The animation was great! :-) The children had very good time in the kids' club and the mini disco! The adults liked very much the other activities!

This hotel is fantastic. The staff are all so welcoming and attentive. The hotel is about 50 minutes from the airport.   The room was a bungalow 204. It was large with 2 small doubles pushed together. The shower was really good and it was kept clean.   The grounds in the hotel are clean and tidy. Everyone says hello whilst they work.  The hotel has a well equipped gym. The pools are a good size and there are always plenty of sunbeds available. The pool boys were always there to lay out the lounger cushions for you. The waiters come around asking if you want a drink all day. The beach was also good and we swam in the sea several times.   Food, we were never disappointed with the food. We mainly ate in the buffet restaurant. Our waiter Walhidi was brilliant. He always had our table set and wine ready to pour. He was one of the most friendly people you could meet.   Staff, they were all great, the entertainment team were always friendly and would stop for a chat even if you didn’t take part in the activity.   Bar staff, they were exceptional, they all knew your drinks and would tell you to sit down and they would bring them to you. The attention was great as they would be bringing the next round before you finished.   Tipping was never asked for, unlike Egypt where everyone wants a tip. The staff here were never pushy or rude. Everyone had a smile and seemed genuinely happy. We did tip well overall the two weeks but it was deserved.   Overall a fantastic holiday in Tunisia. This was our first visit here and we never go back to the same place twice however we will make an exception in this case. Thanks to everyone at the hotel for making the holiday so good.

The Hotel and Service were just great so our on week vacation was so relaxing. Located directly at the beach, enjoyed the sea. Staff at beach great, animation team excellent, especially Lala and Alex.  Would definitely stay again and recommend to friends and family.

reviews.review_title: correct but little better to do
reviews.review_text: Following the reviews I was disappointed in fact l hotel is clean although some renovations are to be expected (fridge broken down, hair dryer that overheats hunt that malfunctions ) the food is correct but the reservations to the other two restaurants are very difficult we could not go there because always complete even if we wanted to book the day of our arrival.  The staff remains the big downside. They are not smiling we always have the impression that they mock us. speak poorly French and very poorly organized. Fortunately the animation team raises the level and is very nice.

Very nice hotel, very spacious and clean rooms. Great spa. Very professional and very kind staff. The animators always smile and always there to set the mood, special mention to Rita who is really a pearl. I recommend.

Such a Good experience!  Everithing was perfect: the room, the excelent food,  the animation team which organise something new every day!  Everyone really polite and very kind.  A particular thanks to Rita, so lovely with our kid!  We’ll come back fore sure!!

Fantastic hotel an animation team perfect very friendly cared for staff the bungalow is very good and very cared for anyway everything very good very satisfied we will be back  Because the Tunisian people are incredibly friendly and courteous

Holiday at Hammamet Tunisia with stay at Steigenberger was fantastic and would highly recommend. All facilities were on point from activities, meals, entertainment to staff. Entertainment Team were great with fun activities bringing everyone together. Massive shoutout to Chouchou from the Entertainment Team, thanks.

This hotel has been excellent from start to finish . Staff have all been amazing, entertainment have been excellent  big shout to chouchou was amazing though the holiday made the holiday fun . Highy recommend place 5* though out . From food n all services

Great holiday at the Steigenberger Hotel all facilities were more than expected and really enjoyable. Entertainment Team were fantastic with how they accommodate guests to make it fun and enjoyable, massive thanks to them all. Shout out to the Six Pack Challenge rep - chouchou/Rashida/

I am writing this review to say i am having a great holiday here at the Steigenberger Maharba  hotel in Hammamet. The hotel is beautiful, we always book a room in the main hotel on the 3rd floor. We paid extra for a sea view which was well worth paying for. The food and service are always really great. Amazing  choice of food. Something for everyone.  I would like to say how good your Entertainment team are. They are all extremely friendly, informative and helpful. I’ve taken part in a few of the activities and especially like the Aquaswim, Pilates, Yoga and Zumba.  LaLa is a credit to your company. She always goes the extra mile in everything she does. She keeps us all full informed about the activities during the day and in the evening.  In the evenings the entertainment has been great. The team are always attentive and encouraging.  Thank you. Keep up the good work.  I would definitely recommend this hotel.

name: JAZ Tour Khalef Hotel
description: Looking for a place to stay in Sousse? Then look no further than JAZ Tour Khalef Thalasso & Spa, a family-friendly hotel that brings the best of Sousse to your doorstep.You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and you can stay connected during your stay as Tour Khalef Marhaba Thalasso Hotel offers guests free wifi.The hotel features a concierge. Plus, Tour Khalef Hotel offers a pool and an on-site restaurant, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Equestrian Statue of Habib Bourguiba (1.7 mi) and Ribat (1.8 mi), guests of JAZ Tour Khalef Thalasso & Spa can easily experience some of Sousse's most well known attractions.While in Sousse be sure to experience local ribs favorites at Farmers Steakhouse.If you are looking for something to do in the area, Eglise Saint-Felix (1.2 mi) is a popular attraction that is within walking distance of JAZ Tour Khalef Thalasso & Spa.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at JAZ Tour Khalef Thalasso & Spa as you experience everything Sousse has to offer.Read more
property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

reviews.review_text: Nice hotel, and nice people , we are visiting for the second time here and we will be back again .. my daughters love lolly (kids club) so much and she is our reason we came back ..she is a special lady, she also does her job from the heart ❤️ the children ask for her and make video call with her through the year. Our thanks to everyone for a memorable stay again.

Lolli, animation lady, is the stand out reason why my children wanted to come back to this hotel. She is so lovely, very friendly, always full of ideas that children love and every evening there is a disco where she makes sure all children are on their feet and involved. There really is no fault. Everyone is willing to help and welcome you. We will be returning again next year.

absolutely fabulous place, staff were so friendly, if I could give more stars I would. food was good, place clean, everything was ridiculously cheap. but the staff made the holiday for us. my wife is in a wheelchair and she was really looked after. brilliant

Completely lost for words, not one for doing reviews but this hotel and staff blew me away. Been many places but this is the best place I have ever been to and will definitely be going back time and time again. On arrival felt as if straight away the staff that greeted us it felt like we had been there before, the service to our room was with ease porter took our cases and showed us where our room was, and once inside the room and bathroom where lovely. During our stay every day was made to feel like a dream, the staff there are out of this world always had a smile and so friendly, I give a big thank you to Adel from the restaurant made our every meal time unreal, Hazem from the pool never without a drink top waiter. Sahbi from the snack bar true ace, Nidhal the lifeguard was there to always have a great laugh and managed to get my wife to go down the water slide she hates her head going under water tops marks and a big thanks to all the animation team Alex, Bibo, Willy, Salah, and Malek these guys put there heart and soul in to the entertainment ever day and night top guys.  So a big thanks to the hotel and all its staff that make this place a dream come true already booked to go back next year, thanks for the best 10 days ever

How anyone can give less than 5 stars are clearly spoilt and self entitled. The hotel and facilities are excellent but one thing that makes this place exceptional are the people. The staff are nothing short of amazing, friendly and always smiling. Big shout out to Adel from the restaurant, Sahbi from the snack bar, Hazem from the pool bar, Nidhal the lifeguard and from the animation team Alex, Bido, William and new boy Malek. Fabulous 10 days and will be returning again very soon, thanks and love to you all.

A special thank you to our waiter at the restaurant, Mohamed Snoussi, for his enthusiastic welcome, his good mood and the flowery decorum. We greatly appreciated it.  Beautiful hotel well located, all the staff takes good care of us.  Trip to this place again.

reviews.review_title: Relaxation, sport: experience at the top under the Tunisian sun...
reviews.review_text: We had a great time at Jaz Tour Kalef.  Very spacious and well equipped room. Very smiling staff, great friendliness, very available...a big thank you to Sabeur in particular, who was to the small care on the terrace.  The buffet offered us particularly varied and tasty dishes. Impossible to taste everything!!! Theme restaurants, on the other hand, do not bring a more qualitative. Swimming pool and beach beds at the top to enjoy the sun...in short a beautiful experience, to be repeated soon for 10 days this time rather than 7..That's all. .. Jean-Marc Magis and Marie-Pierre Dejoie

I like jaz tour khlaf excellent restaurant animation top. I really loved the karaoker night top clean room and wonderful view really a 5 star hotel not to miss I will come back to this next summer with the whole family to sing and dance l9l

reviews.review_title: A great hotel with great childcare
reviews.review_text: Jaz Tour Khalef Hotel is a really great hotel with nice rooms, a great beach and great food. The staff is super friendly and goes to great lengths to offer guests an unforgettable stay. What is particularly positive to mention is the childcare, the animator "Lolli" is a real asset to the hotel, she is not only friendly, competent and reliable, the children love her and we loved the way she treats the children.  Lolli is just great!  We can absolutely recommend the hotel for families with children 👍👍 We are already looking forward to our next holiday there and our children are looking forward to Lolli🤗

reviews.review_title: This was not what we were used to from Jaz Tour Khalef.
reviews.review_text: There is nothing to say about the hotel itself, the ambiance is excellent service and friendly top. Food is versatile and excellent. for such a large mass of cooking this is not often encountered. Only it was disappointing for us, maybe the wrong time. The UK crowd was rowdy in the restaurant and lobby. Children could express themselves where I don't write an opinion now. The plates at lunch and dinner were overloaded with what then disappeared into the trash. It is a pity that this partly disadvantaged the holiday atmosphere.  Visited this hotel four times for the purpose! Back home, but this time it was not the case. It's too bad.

Amazing hotel and the staff could not do more for you, especially William from animation team. They always make sure you are having fun. Would recommend hotel to anyone who is looking to book. The hotel is stunning and well looked after by the staff

Spacious rooms and bathrooms Deckchair in sufficient quantity Various restoration The staff is very nice very smiling  We can eat and drink all the time But because there's a but... the animation team is nonexistent. Too proud not smiling at all shocking. except the 2 girls Oumima and Maissa who are adorable

reviews.review_title: This was not JAZ Tour Khalef as we used to
reviews.review_text: We booked the hotel for the fourth time. First in advance maybe it was a wrong time from May 6 to 16. Never experienced such a noisy time in this hotel as in this period. It was crowded, In the restaurant it was a clatter of plates, sliding chairs and screams of jewelery. Our compliments to the staff who provided polite and optimal service. The food is excellent and versatile. This was also evident in many people from the lavishly filled plates which were later thrown away. (Definitely nothing used to at home). After 8pm it really started. Instead of enjoying a cup of coffee with a drink in the beautiful lobby, the screaming started with excessive children's disco violence. For dessert, the loud house pounding alternated with Miss hotel pageant or Drag Queen until 23:00. Past times it has been held outside or in another location of the hotel. Fine for the lovers but not for us. JAZ Tour Khalef a pearl of Sousse but this time the glass was far from there. About the hotel nothing to criticize service, friendliness no trouble too much this is really TOP. Rooms are neat, park and pool with stand is neat and everything with a top service. Too bad a beautiful location with all possibilities both the city of Sousse and surroundings as stand. But not for us anymore.

Hotel is listed as a 5 star, but i would give only 3. Food is good, service is great, but the rooms, carpets, curtains, … really need an upgrade.  But my biggest disappointment was the beach area. The pool adults only, was not clearly indicated, so there were kids and the lifeguard doesn’t say anything. The good  seats were blocked  early morning, and the lifeguard did not do anything against it, as he was also blocking for some people. Obviously not enough room for the many people in the hotel.

The hotel is huge rooms are very nice ..plenty of swimming pools on the beachfront...security is good no one can walk on the hotel grounds if they are staying here..was on all inclusive package so buffet had a huge selection of choice..staff are friendly and helpful.

Amazing place. Friendly staff and great food. Lovely beach area with lots of great views. Definitely recommend it in the summer when the water is hot in the swimming pools and the sea. We stayed more in the indoor pool  We cannot wait to get back there next year.

First time on family holiday and have had the best time.  10/10 hotel to stay in.  Staff exceptionally good and helpful with everything and will always be there for anything you need. Rooms 10/10 Top staff and 10/10 to. Willy, Alex, Faro (lifeguard) & Malek.

name: Iberostar Selection Royal El Mansour
description: The Iberostar Selection Royal El Mansour hotel is found on the seafront of the marvellous beach in Mahdia, Tunisia. This 5-star hotel is designed for couples and families with children and it offers everything necessary to spend some days of pleasure, fun and entertainment. It features 447 spacious rooms located on the Mediterranean and equipped down to the finest details. The Royal El Mansour hotel offers luxury facilities, such as direct access to the beach in Mahdia, free Wi-Fi, a thalassotherapy area with a sauna, hammam and Turkish baths, massages, beauty salon and hairdressers, All Inclusive accommodation type (optional), Monkey Club (ages 4 to 7), Dolphin Club (ages 8 to 12), children’s park, fitness centre, heated children’s pool, fitness room, meeting rooms... And for all hotel guests, the hotel also has a main restaurant where you can savour the best of Tunisian cuisine and diverse specialities in international cuisine, as well as four bars, among them the delightful Arab Cafe.Read more
property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

reviews.review_text: Amazing place to stay. Staff are very welcoming and friendly always smiling and helping us  Great food great service lovely view amazing activities to   Pool lovely and seaside outside the hotel amazing place   Room was amazing very homely  Love it

Animation staff are brilliant, always smiling and happy and make you feel welcome and special, all the staff are lovely and attentive. Room view was not the best and room dated but it clean, fresh towels.  Lots of sun beds, pool clean and tidy and bar staff always lovely. Food good enough choice.

Good hotel but food could be better as there is a very low variety of options to choose from . Overall the hospitality by the staff is good and welcoming and service was good . The rooms could have better light and AC Facility. Staff over all is amazing

good quality hotel , good food ... good location Mahdia is a very safe and residential city , we especially appreciated the really impeccable and very welcoming staff , the smile of Mrs Fapen and her good humor   Thank you and see you soon

C is a 3 stars and not a 5 Everything sucks  Never go there  Only the servers are good I Reception is null Animations suck  Food esy infected Everything fake Shame on TunisiaThe beach service could be sweet when we need them The location is shabby Quality zero price No atmosphere

reviews.review_title: Best place to stay in Tunisia
reviews.review_text: Hotel was amazing, much more than welcome expected. The staff can't do enough to ensure you have the best holiday. Food excellent, and a beautiful place to stay. Not to forget the amazing cleaning staff, everyday a new creation made for us from towels. Reception staff always eager to please. I will definitely return

Just back from a week long stay, here is my honest review.  From landing at Enfidha Airport we were around 3 hours to the hotel which was a long journey but we knew when we booked it that this would be the case which is a shame as Monastir Airport is relatively closer but there were no flights to there from Scotland.  We were greeted by the staff who took our bags up to our room for us, the rooms were lovely and we had a sea view which was outstanding. The maids changed our towels and beds everyday but went the extra mile with the lovely towel art. Can’t fault the rooms.  The pool was lovely and spacious and the service round the pool was amazing, before we had finished our drinks the bar staff would come over with fresh drinks all day long, possibly some of the best service I’ve ever had. The animation team done a great job keeping everyone entertained and a special mention to the water polo which was very competitive but lots of fun.  The food at lunch and dinner was nice, not exceptional but really good and lots on offer if you are a fussy eater.   The night time entertainment was a laugh and the animation team done a good job at the comedy nights by the getting the crowd up and involved. Once again as soon as You finished a drink they were over asking if you wanted more drinks.  Only a couple of negatives to take away from our trip:  The breakfast, it wasn’t to our taste which does not mean it is bad but it’s a lot more continental which included pastries, fresh fruit and vegetables. We lived on omelets and scrambled eggs all week😂.   The cocktails were sometimes non drinkable and tasted nothing like what they should have been. These are vodka and then they are put into a machine and the machine adds the mixers. We ordered strawberry daiquiris and pina coladas, these tasted nothing like what they should have but again this may be because they are poured out of a machine.  And last of all was the horse and carriage outside the hotel, I love animals and was saddened to see the horse stand outside in the heat with no constant water supply, I actually did not see the horse receive water once and I would regularly check. I just hope the horses are looked after.  These are the only downfalls to take away.   Apart from these it was a magnificent stay and I would 100% return as the service was excellent.

All the staff are friendly and kind, room and pool area is welcoming and lovely, very close to the beach and amazing food!! The staff make sure everyone is included and with brilliant entertainment. The room service is also very personal and well done.

reviews.review_title: First and not last time in Tunisia
reviews.review_text: The hotel is very big and clean  All the staff arw freindly  Iam here with my brother and his wife we realy have a great time this is our first time in tunisia and we just love this beautiful county we stayed a week here and we just stayed at the hotel because thers all activities to enjoy here we stay on the beach on the pool we do activities with the animations team they are lovely thanks for every one who help to make our holiday amazing and lovely . See you soon Tunisia

reviews.review_title: Exceptional stay at the hotel mansour mahdia
reviews.review_text: We highly recommend the hotel mansour mahdia , Exceptional stay in this property that deserves all its stars. Excellent welcome, comfortable rooms, tasty food and impeccable facilities. An experience to be repeated very soon.

A warm and very professional welcome, the staff, all requests are well taken care of and with a smile on top. A big bravo to all the staff. Hygiene is there, the animation is dynamic and the meals are good.

The location of the hotel is excellent by the sea. panoramic views of the pool and the sea. The food is really delicious. Restaurant employees at the top .really hotel to recommend for families and couples .a big thank you for the staff

Great hotel thank you. qA big thank you to all the Royal Mansour Mahdia team for an unforgettable stay! Special mention to the animation team which was exceptional: always smiling, dynamic and with little care, especially with the children. Our little ones had fun every day thanks to the varied and well supervised activities. A real plus for families! A special thank you to Maya (Mimi) for her kindness, energy and attention to the children — she created a real complicity with them, and it is priceless.

name: Iberostar Waves Averroes
description: The Iberostar Waves Averroes hotel is located on a large and wide sand beach and just a short walk from the centre of Yasmine-Hammamet. The complex features elegant Mediterranean architecture with touches of the local region and offers its guests a total of 266 rooms. Of note among its facilities and services are its outdoor pool with Jacuzzi and its spa with a wet area, massages, and treatments.If you’re a sports lover, this is your best option as the hotel features an outdoor sports area, tennis court, water sports in summer, fitness room, and a golf course nearby.Read more
property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

reviews.review_text: We are just back from the Iberostar Waves Averroes we had a great time the hotel was just great the staff couldn’t do enough for you. The entertainments team work hard at keeping everyone happy without being too pushy.  The restaurant and food were outstanding and you can also go to the Tunisian A’ la Carte which we absolutely loved.  The all inclusive drinks package covers enough different drinks to keep most folks happy, the bar staff turn to a couple of times a week and have cocktails poolside and in foyer.  The rooms are a decent size and the cleaning staff work hard to keep everything extremely clean and tidy.  They were replacing all the carpets on all floors while we were there it was not intrusive and they worked hard to cause minimal disruption.

The service was top, welcoming and kind all over the StarFriends team, the bar waiters for the meal was vast and delicious, the friendly entourage, when we arrived the welcome service was kind and already waiting for us , the room is already prepared and clean , the pools clean and easy access to the sea, the only negative was the absence of the shower at the sanitary level.

reviews.review_title: Nice holiday with very good value for money
reviews.review_text: Rooms are big and clean maid very attentive.Service in restaurant great.All staff very nice and warm. Best of all, the guys from the pool bar are very good and very service oriented.Especially Achmed best man.

- [ ] There was no iron in the room so we had to ask for it. And we had it for the duration of our trip.  - [ ] No water unless all inclusive despite being 4 starts.  - [ ] Food alright same all the time. They did have chips and nuggets at one point which did save me.  - [ ] Decent location with shops and bazar close by. Also 20 min walk and you’re near the Maxi center where there are more food places and shops.  - [ ] We experienced our first carnival  - [ ] Booked excursion and tourist stuff through hotel as it was more reliable.  - [ ] The hotels spa rooms were being refurbed so we were able to go to another hotel and use their facilities. There is a guy there who works at iberostar and takes people to the spa place (2 min drive)  - [ ] Customer service went above and beyond 10/10. We booked 2 sea view rooms which we did and had a door connecting the rooms. We weren’t happy with the bathroom or the bedding. They kindly moved us to the opposite room for the night and said they’ll sort it in the morning. They kindly gave us water when we spoke to them about the room and there not being any water. In the morning they said they’re doing everything they can, made sure whatever room we got it had a sea view and they made sure of it. They let us check out the rooms before they moved us to make sure we were happy and we were. Again the bathroom wasn’t the greatest but it was bearable - [ ] For a 4 star hotel I expected more. Interior a little outdated.  - [ ] Wish the pool hours were a little longer so after a long day of being out we could’ve spent time in the pool. Maybe because of the season it’s 9am-6pm.  - [ ] No air con doesn’t come on until June…let’s just say sometimes it did get a little warm but nothing too bad.  -[ ] 24/7 security outside the hotel and its gates and they do security checks on each and every vehicle.  - [ ] Overall the stay, hospitality and people there were amazing.

Traveled as friends we stayed at this hotel for 4 nights as a little getaway and it was brilliant. The service from staff at this hotel was amazing the hotel itself is lovely there’s a big pool with a swim up bar which the drinks were good, very good from the barman Mtir. The food in the dining hall was nice I would say it’s abit repetitive but there was every meat you could want and more, the food stations don’t always have signs on to tell you what dish it is maybe that could be improved but still delicious as was dessert and fruit options. The entertainment team were fantastic always making sure you’re happy around the pool asking you to get involved with activities and teaching you dances etc. Big shout out to Yuma & Alpha they were brilliant. Evening entertainment was okay could’ve been abit more on and didn’t finish too early. The rooms are spacious with 2 wardrobes comes with a fridge and separate toilet to the bathroom, beds were comfy however pillows were abit hard.. the corridors to the rooms were a abit outdated and could do with a little touch up but nothing big. Our time at this hotel was lovely and I would recommend it if you’re looking for a quiet place to stay! Right on a sandy beach. Thanks to all the lovely staff / entertainment staff.

reviews.review_title: An unforgettable family holiday in Hammamet ✨
reviews.review_text: I stayed at the Iberostar Waves Averroes from May 8 to 12 with my mother, aunt and cousin to celebrate my mom’s birthday. This trip had great sentimental value for us, as we came to discover our grandmother’s homeland. And this hotel has made our stay even more special.  Upon arrival, we were greeted with warmth and kindness. The staff was simply adorable, always attentive, attentive and available at all times. So much so that they have come to call us “the family”, which perfectly sums up the friendly and caring atmosphere that prevails in the hotel.  The setting is idyllic: a large swimming pool, beautiful gardens perfectly maintained, a private beach with direct access... A real little corner of paradise. The cleaning team also touched us with its delicate attention: folded towels in adorable shapes, small flowers on the bed... simple gestures that were always pleasure 🌸  The most beautiful memory is undoubtedly our meeting with the animation team. Thanks from the bottom of my heart to Faty, Djappa, Alpha and the whole team for their good humor, humor and communicative energy. Thanks to them, we participated in lots of activities, laughed and created memories engraved forever. You can see that they really love what they do, and it’s a real joy to see them convey so much joy.  The icing on the cake, we also met great people during our stay, with whom we immediately sympathized. Many shared laughs, simple but sincere moments that made our experience even more beautiful.  As for the restaurant, the buffet was well supplied and varied: international dishes, fresh fruit at will, and a small stand of local specialities. A big thank you to the catering team, always available and attentive. The only downside would be the lack of typical Tunisian dishes throughout the buffet, and a little disappointment regarding the restaurant “L’Olivier”.  But overall, Miss France leaves with stars full of eyes 👑✨ A huge thank you to the entire Iberostar Waves Averroes team for these precious moments. We leave with a light heart, a calm mind and with memories full of head 💛

Beautiful property. Great service, all staff very attentive, friendly and helpful. Our housekeeper Afifa kept our room spotless and well supplied.  Very good location, walking distance to many restaurants. Overall, great experience.

We just come back from Tunisia,  we had a really nice time there. The hotel was well located with direct access to the beach, not far from Medina.  The staff was really nice and welcoming.  At the restaurant, there was a large variety of choices.  The room was very spacious and clean.  I would definitely recommend this hotel.

The staff are so friendly no matter who you come across, room size is amazing and clean, the food it so repetitive, I've always seen reviews saying this but always found something, not here this was a massive disappointment, the same everyday and not very nice in our opinion. The lifeguard pictured couldn't do enough for us he went above and beyond.

My husband and I stayed for one week at the end of April early May. The hotel was well maintained and clean throughout, with security on the gate making it feel a safe place to relax.   The reception staff were welcoming and helpful answering any questions we had regarding taxi prices and destination advice.  The entertainment team were really friendly, encouraging everyone to participate in the activities.  We played petanque on the beach, darts around the pool and Yoga every morning. Bingo, Tunisia night and cocktail evenings where just a few of the evening entertainment activities.   The Laurier buffet restaurant was spacious and offered a wide selection of foods. We also used the La Palmier the beach buffet area most lunch times. Waiters at both were very welcoming, attentive and polite.  Abdul was our main waiter in the Fleurs Dr Lys lounge bar. He was great, surprising us with delicious cocktails every evening.  Amhed was our main pool bar waiter, again fabulous service remembering our drinks orders and ensuring we had plenty of bottled water for our room.    Our housekeeper, unfortunately we didn't catch her name, was great. Always making sure we had clean towels etc and surprising us with fabulous towel origami each day.   Tunisia it's self is a beautiful place with white sandy beaches and a clear blue sea. However, it is a very poor part of the world and you can see this in the upkeep of some of the buildings and empty hotels

reviews.review_title: Very satisfied to discover this hotel,
reviews.review_text: Very satisfied to find Tunisia of its inhabitants so respectful so smiling, after 7 years absence I returned to Hammamet South in this beautiful hotel. I am very happy to have been very well received at Iberostar Averroes and well considered. I hope I can return to this hotel

We stayed a week in all inclusive at this hotel in early April. The hotel is well located, with direct access to the beach, and not far from the Medina. Nothing to say about the reception and service, all the staff, whether at the reception, restaurant or activities, is helpful and inviting. It wasn't the full season yet so the hotel was quiet, I guess there must be more people later in the season. On the other hand, the pool bar was not open yet, and the entertainment a little light, no or few people attended, so it was always a bit the same every night despite the efforts of the whole animation team who were passing really nice and with whom we had very good times. At the restaurant level, the buffet for all meals is complete, varied and really good, we ate very (too) well all week. The drinks offered as part of the package are enough, we did not have to add to get what we wanted. The rooms are rather spacious for 2, maybe a little more just for 3 (we were 5 and we had 2 connecting rooms of identical size, one for 2 and one for 3), on the other hand the shower was large and well designed, it is rare to be able to take a shower in a hotel without having to water the whole bathroom. A small downside, however, on the maintenance, we could see that several elements were patched together, such as the toilet-paper support, like the somewhat capricious flush, or like the bathroom door that did not close because she had worked. We had a great week and would recommend this hotel.

We stayed at the end of April we were 8 with family in this hotel you can close eyes hotel on top very clean spacious room restaurant various choices and excellent the awesome bar activities at the top (little thought of djappa de dj evan’s) outdoor and awesome pool and especially all the staff is at the small care and service of its guests  I recommend this hotel you will not be disappointed

Since 2020, we were the 12th. Let's go to this wonderful hotel. This time with the whole family as we had GOLDEN WEDDING.  The hotel management gave us a big beautiful bouquet of roses. In the evening our table was very festively set with candles and flowers. All the employees made this day special. Again, a huge thank you to everyone ❣️❣️❣️ The weather was great, of the 2 weeks 11 days sun lounger was trendy. Ahmed has brought us very accommodating the drinks to the loungers!  Food as always very tasty and attractively decorated. We are already looking forward to the next holiday in September and counting the days until then

The best thing about the hotel was the breakfast, very complete and varied and the service of tooooooo all employees including the entertainment (very happy people, nice and always at the service to help). At lunch as at dinner there was a lot of variety but it was really guessing that you ate because there were either no signs or they were not in their correct order. Then if you want to eat something between lunch and dinner, basically make do with what's left of lunch. Regarding the cleanliness leaves enough to be desired, at one time we arrived in the afternoon and had not yet cleaned the room. The hotel lacks much maintenance and better ventilation especially on the first floor where the restaurant windows are... Oh, and the heated pool is just the mbiebte, not the water.  Read more

reviews.review_title: To be done again with great pleasure
reviews.review_text: I can't think of anything better. Beautiful buffet hotel very well stocked. Room nickel animation at the top Thank you very much to the staff and especially Nesrine who knows her work very well. Many thanks to all the iberostar team.

name: El Mouradi Palm Marina
description: Built in Hispano-Moorish style close to the marina at Port el Kantaoui, dotted with gardens leading to a beach of fine sand, the El Mouradi Palm Marina is the ideal hotel for a relaxing holiday. For golfers, the 36-hole El Kantaoui golf course is two kilometres away. The hotel is 10 kilometres from the town of Sousse, 35 kilometres from Monastir's Habib Bourguiba airport, 40 kms from Enfidha airport, 70 kilometres from Yasmine Hammamet and 135 kilometres from the capital Tunis.Read more
property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

reviews.review_text: Just returned from a wonderful week at this hotel with all the family.  We have nothing to complain about, we were so well looked after by the staff across all areas of the hotel. From the maid in our room to the waiters in the restaurant, pool and main bar and the animation team. Nothing was too much trouble and they were all so friendly and great with the grandchildren.  It’s a larger hotel than we are used to but there was always sunbeds round the pool and  beach and somewhere to sit in the evening. As we were a party of nine a table was saved for us in the dining room by our lovely waiter Khaled everyday.  Food was lovely, great selection every night, so plenty to choose from and something for everybody. First visit to this hotel but 8th to Tunisia, we will return again

Everythig was amazing at the hotel. The service were great, the activities and entertainment team made our stay here better, especially Speedy, who was very friendly to all of US 🏝🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰

reviews.review_title: Wonderful stay, apart from few things
reviews.review_text: This hotel location is very good for beach holiday and relaxing. Their welcoming was not that great, as no one came to us to show the hotel and introduce us every thing, we had to find and look for all the facilities. Other than that the room was very clean, the lady Farida was very nice and hardworking. She is very helpful and friendly.  Food was very good and organised. Waiters were friendly and polite. Sea water pool was amazing but not enough sit for everyone.  All the staff in the hotel were very nice and friendly. I will recommend this hotel for relaxing coz it bit far from the madina or souk.

reviews.review_title: Would like to say thank u to all the animation team !!Had a lovely time everyone so lovely !! Best hotel  here
reviews.review_text: Best hotel lovely entertainment team and lovely food the pool is lovely and the rooms are lovely all the mira lulu christiano and kita Steve and speedy and very friendly and very professional work and the staff were very hands on and the entertainment staff are very happy all the time!!

The best entertainers LouLou is crazy, good food nice rooms lovely pools and comfortable  Good trip people who arrange safe trips such as quads and boat trips like Bassam the Camel man   Nice area been told a couple stories but we went out a lot and was quite safe and except from harrasment to buy stuff but you just tell them no or ignore them.

Hotel 5 stars. Immaculate rooms.  General cleanliness of the room impeccable, even a small gesture of the maid every day cheer us. Always careful with guests.  Always varied food, amazing buffet.  The beach 5 stars, great water. We adore

I’ll start by saying the hotel is not perfect, it’s certainly not 5 star and is in need of some refurb.   That aside we thoroughly enjoy our stay and there’s a lot on offer for families, this is our 2nd stay and we would come back again.  All staff are amazing, it’s a shame we can’t name everyone individually, but special shout to animation team : Yaya and Maya for the kids club / activities and Mira,Lou Lou, Speedy, Cristiano and not forgetting the DJ Steve all deserve 5 stars they make the stay fun and you can’t help but attached to them, it’s sad to say bye but we’ll be back.  As mentioned the room’s need some refurb, cracked tiles etc, but that can be a good overlooked as the cleaning staff keep the rooms very clean and tidy, “Sonia” was our cleaner and greeted us with her wonderful smile daily and the service from her and her team was 5 stars.  Thanks to all the staff bar staff and waiters can’t name you all we felt truly well looked after.  Tesh, Hena & Ethan

the room was very nicely cleaned, nice and pleasant service, we are in room 226 and we are very pleased with the lady who cleaned our room, the hotel service is very nice, the waiters are smiling, everywhere is clean, the food is delicious, there is plenty to choose from, I recommend this hotel

Really enjoyed my stay here, the entertainment team are all very fun especially Speedy, Loulou and Cristiano. Worked hard all day everyday, made my stay there very enjoyable, we're all very helpful. The hotel was very clean and had a very calm atmosphere.

Beautiful hotel, wonderful architecture. Very accommodating staff.  The supervisors from the animation team were the highlight of the stay, working hard all day everyday to provide entertainment and comfort. Cristiano, Speedy, Lou Lou, to just name a few.

Check in smooth and without fuss. Thanks to Makram for organising a beautiful room and to our cleaning lady Halima for keeping our room spotless and doing some lovely bed decoration. Ben Zid,Ismail,Rania and Ouymima for looking after us in the dining room. Also thanks to the chef and his team for providing delicious and varied food.In the bar a big thank you to Rania, always served us with a smile and had the next drink on the table just as I was finishing the last one. Khamais,Gassen and the pool team for getting the beds,pads and towels as soon as we came down. Well done the entertainment team on your hard work providing activities throughout the day and putting on shows at night. After 20 years of coming to the hotel,the service is always five star and we look forward to our next visit.

Thoroughly enjoyed from the moment we arrived. Reception were friendly and helpful   The staff were great, especially Ismail in the buffet restaurant, Firas, Fakher and Bassem at the bar. Whatever they're paid, they don't get paid enough! They were superb from day one  The food was fresh and delicious with plenty of variety  The room was spacious and always clean  Lots of activities available with Bassem the quad man and the guys on the beach   The entertainment was fun with different shows each night  We will definitely be back!

name: Iberostar Selection Kantaoui Bay
description: Located right on a sandy beach in the centre of the tourist area of Port El Kantaoui, the Iberostar Selection Kantaoui Bay is a comprehensive 5-star hotel where you can relax and unwind in luxury. Nearly all of its 358 rooms and suites have ocean views from the terrace, as well as being very spacious and have useful facilities such as free wifi, air conditioning, amenities, comfortable beds, natural light and a lovely ambience. Iberostar Kantaoui Bay has a wide range of facilities. Among the services offered are its SPA Sensations, outdoor swimming pools, direct access to the beach, all-inclusive package, fitness room, room service, water sports, disco, 3 restaurants (Italian, Oriental and Tunisian) and 5 bars, conference rooms for events and weddings ... All you need to experience a few unique days in the best area of Port El Kantaoui.Read more

As mentioned the room’s need some refurb, cracked tiles etc, but that can be a good overlooked as the cleaning staff keep the rooms very clean and tidy, “Sonia” was our cleaner and greeted us with her wonderful smile daily and the service from her and her team was 5 stars.  Thanks to all the staff bar staff and waiters can’t name you all we felt truly well looked after.  Tesh, Hena & Ethan

the room was very nicely cleaned, nice and pleasant service, we are in room 226 and we are very pleased with the lady who cleaned our room, the hotel service is very nice, the waiters are smiling, everywhere is clean, the food is delicious, there is plenty to choose from, I recommend this hotel

Really enjoyed my stay here, the entertainment team are all very fun especially Speedy, Loulou and Cristiano. Worked hard all day everyday, made my stay there very enjoyable, we're all very helpful. The hotel was very clean and had a very calm atmosphere.

Beautiful hotel, wonderful architecture. Very accommodating staff.  The supervisors from the animation team were the highlight of the stay, working hard all day everyday to provide entertainment and comfort. Cristiano, Speedy, Lou Lou, to just name a few.

Check in smooth and without fuss. Thanks to Makram for organising a beautiful room and to our cleaning lady Halima for keeping our room spotless and doing some lovely bed decoration. Ben Zid,Ismail,Rania and Ouymima for looking after us in the dining room. Also thanks to the chef and his team for providing delicious and varied food.In the bar a big thank you to Rania, always served us with a smile and had the next drink on the table just as I was finishing the last one. Khamais,Gassen and the pool team for getting the beds,pads and towels as soon as we came down. Well done the entertainment team on your hard work providing activities throughout the day and putting on shows at night. After 20 years of coming to the hotel,the service is always five star and we look forward to our next visit.

Thoroughly enjoyed from the moment we arrived. Reception were friendly and helpful   The staff were great, especially Ismail in the buffet restaurant, Firas, Fakher and Bassem at the bar. Whatever they're paid, they don't get paid enough! They were superb from day one  The food was fresh and delicious with plenty of variety  The room was spacious and always clean  Lots of activities available with Bassem the quad man and the guys on the beach   The entertainment was fun with different shows each night  We will definitely be back!
