name: Dar El Jeld Hotel & Spa
description: Finding an ideal luxury small hotel in Tunis does not have to be difficult. Welcome to DAR EL JELD Hotel & Spa, a nice option for travelers like you.Rooms at DAR EL JELD Hotel & Spa offer air conditioning and a minibar providing exceptional comfort and convenience.A concierge and room service are some of the conveniences offered at this small hotel. Free breakfast will also help to make your stay even more special.Close to Zitouna Mosque (3.1 mi), a popular Tunis landmark, DAR EL JELD Hotel & Spa is a great destination for tourists.While visiting Tunis, you may want to try some tapas at one of the nearby restaurants, such as Le Comptoir de Tunis.Plus, during your trip, don't forget to check out a history museum, such as National military museum.DAR EL JELD Hotel & Spa puts the best of Tunis at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.Read more

reviews.review_title: This hotel is in a perfect!
reviews.review_text: What a beautifully appointed property. A feast for the eyes! Staff is friendly and eager to please.  This hotel is also situated in a perfect location.  The roof top restaurant offers beautiful views, great service and delicious food!  The Hammam was a disappointment.

Hotel to recommend! Nothing wrong. Our best 5* hotel, all our stay. Clean suite, impeccable rooftop, excellent kitchen. Do not hesitate, you will not regret it. If we were to return to Tunis, our choice would be this hotel and not another!

The hotel is a little hard to find  as it's nestled amidst the alleys of the Medina. Getting there by car is a little hard. But once you're there it's like a tiny oasis. The attention to detail is incredible. Your eye is diverted to every nook and cranny.  The service is superb. After a shopping spree the staff managed to conjure up extra cartons to pack and also opened their boutiqueat 1am to take out scotch tape.  Would go back there again tomorrow.  Definitely worth going.

reviews.review_title: THE place in to be in Tunis medina
reviews.review_text: Dar Jeld is well known all over Tunisia and you can tell they set the standard for incredible decor and service. Everything at this location is beautiful. The rooms are spacious, the place itself is a fixture in the medina with its ornate yellow doors and blue windows. The staff are super helpful. The food is outstanding. And the view from the roof is gorgeous. You can get to/way via taxi which is hard for most in the medina. One off the nicest places we have stayed anywhere.

Very nice guest house to visit and stay. The staff is friendly and the atmosphere is perfect. Comfortable bed, beautiful decoration and a le suhour was hearty and varied (we stayed during the month of Ramadan). A beautiful roof top with a breathtaking view of the entire medina. I highly recommend the guest house and we will definitely come back to stay and especially do a SPA.

This is a wonderful hotel right in the medina of Tunis.  The staff was very helpful with anything we needed.  It has a great location, just a few turns away from shops, restaurants, and the old mosques.  The rooms are very big and comfortable.  The restaurant on the rooftop is delicious and the views are great, you can see all of Tunis from up there.  Also, the spa was great. We got a hammam there and it was an amazing experience, its easily worth your time.

Beautiful hotel in the Medina in Tunis.  Great food, wonderful hospitality and loads of positive atmosphere in the old medina. Tunisian people we met are kind and friendly. Spent a week here visiting Carthage, Sidi Bou Said, Bardo Museum, La Marsa and got bus to Hammamet. Hotel has a great spa too.

Always a real pleasure to return to this magical place of luxury and voluptuousness. Coconut in the heart of the medina, this hotel is as beautiful as it is comfortable and exotic. Large roof top for eating or drinking. The staff is very attentive. Anyway, it feels good. Only downside on the quality of the breakfast that would deserve better to stay in tune with the rest.

The hotel is on the edge of the Medina, a perfect location for us—just a short walk to grab a taxi. The property is stunning, beautifully decorated, and full of cozy spots to relax.  They market the suites under Dar El Jeld and the single rooms under Dar Doora. The suites, even the classic ones, are spacious and luxurious. We only realized the Dar Doora connection when making arrangement for a day room before our midnight flight.  The rooftop restaurant serves an international menu during the day, which was a nice change during Ramadan. Breakfast was delicious.  The spa was a plus —free hammam access for guests, a relaxing massage (though not deep tissue), great facial and manicure.  Dar El Jeld is an easy choice for luxury; Dar Doora is a solid lower-cost option.

In the center of the old town, very careful old mansion with high level of services. The staff helpful, the cleanliness impeccable. Transfer to and from the airport. Very good value ratio. I strongly recommend it.

An excellent choise, this Hotel is located in the Madina itself. If you are visiting please book a Taxi from the hotel for Euro 20 it will save you a lot of trouble since regular taxis are not authorised to drive up to the hotel door step and they will drop you off a couple of hundred meters away.  There are plenty of shops, restaurants and things to see all around this Hotel. The staff are pleasant and efficient. The rooms and bath are large and the bath floor is heated. The rooms are large and comfortable and they generously flood you with fruits and chocolates daily which made me feel at home and wanted.  Their spa was good but the hammam portion needs better handling and I was not happy since I was left to fend for myself and constantly had to call someone for assistance.  Food at their restaurant is delicious and the views from the rooftop are a splendid sight. They also a Tunisian restaurant with the same name next door and it is well rated and need a booking.  You cannot go wrong with this hotel !

Hotel advertises that rooms have air conditioning. They do NOT. We had to request fans and were told they don't have any. I had to press the issue and they finally agreed to bring a fan.  Can't leave windows open due to constant street noise and sewer gas smell. Room service food and restaurant meals were embarrassingly bad. Not a luxury place. Not up to international standards.

Beautiful hotel in the heart of the Medina and close to the souk. The charm of the old and modern comfort make it an exceptional place. The staff, very professional is very attentive.  Tunisian cuisine is of very good quality. The superb roof top overlooks the city and gives access to the pool. We spent unforgettable moments there. We recommend this property.

reviews.review_title: Wonderful stay at Dar El Djeb
reviews.review_text: This hotel is amazing! Very nice establishment, beautiful decor, ideal location in the heart of the medina. The suites are very comfortable and pleasant. The rooftop offers magnificent views of the city. But above all, the staff is at the top! Very professional and pleasant, always smiling and very efficient! Thank you to them for the welcome and service. In short, this stay was wonderful!

Splendid hotel, renovated with taste and luxury while respecting the site. Staff with little care. Despite the constraints of our group of 12 people.  Superbly placed in the Medina.  It would be a shame to miss this marvel.

Very nice welcome. Cleanliness of the premises impeccable. A pleasant smell of orange blossom and jasmine floats continuously in the air. The staff listens to their customers. Please take advantage of the wellness area, the staff is also very welcoming and very professional. Remember to book your treatment as soon as you arrive at the hotel. The real positive is its location, it is located in the heart of the medina.

The perfect boutique hotel. The spa is fabulous and far from overpriced. In fact, it is a steal. The negative reviews are absurd and unrealistic.   I did the hammam and 60 min massage for about $58 USD. The aestheticians were fabulous and I walked out feeling renewed. I only wish they had more availability. Book your appointments when you book your room, since it is fully booked. The spa has yummy treats. My only suggestion is that book early, since they run low on amazing local treats.  The hotel rooms are suites. We had a bedroom, living room, and 1.5 bathrooms for about $178 USD. The places is immaculate and beautifully decorated. Chocolates and fruit are given at turn down. I wish they switched it upon arrival.   The restaurants are divine. We ate on the roof which is casual and less than the restaurant where we ate last year. Try both, since it is a very different vibe.  Take the hotel transfer service. I usually don't, but taxis aren't allowed in the Medina and we found ourselves dragging our luggage. The premium for the transfer is worth it especially if arriving at night.  I highly recommend this property. My goal is to find more properties like this globally that deliver exceptional quality at a fair price.

Went to the Spa on Sunday for a manicure, massage and facial treatment. The cosmeticians are faaar from being professional as its visible on the photo with deplorable nailpolish. The quality used for the products is embarrassing. Not even a base coat has been applied. Eventhough not in the hamman itself it was hot like hell. I mentioned several times to turn on the Ac and that heat harms me cause of my medical condition with multiple sclerosis but nothing and it was just me and my sister there at that time, so no risk someone else could "freeze". Viewing the price and honestly even for the tenth of the price an impudence rarely seen

Exceptional hotel, from start to finish no false rating. From the reception at the Spa the best hotel I have made in Tunisia...  The decorations and furnishings of the suites made with taste and without false notes. Rooftop restaurant to do on the other hand the restaurant Dar el Jeld has no interest, I reserve another comment not to distort this one.

Dar El Jeld Hotel and Spa has a beautiful architeture and is situated in one of the best parts of the Medina. It positions itself as a luxury Hotel and SPA. This might be true for the Hotel part. However this is far from being reality when it comes to the SPA. If one pays this prices for a SPA (675 Dinars for two people `100 euro each) in Tunisia one might think that you will be welcomed with at least a glass of water while you are in the waiting room which was not the case. You would also expect to be in the hands of highly professional beauty staff using good to high quality products, which unfortunately is not the case (manicure / nail polish was very poor). The girls are lovely but lack experience. All in all being at the spa was nice but value for money was far from being good. If you sell luxury clients need to get that!

name: Occidental Marco Polo
description: Ideally situated near the sea, in the famous seaside resort of Yasmine Hammamet - Tunisia, Concorde Marco Polo opens its doors for you to a universe full of Mediterranean hues entirely dedicated to your wellbeing so that you can get away from it all and enjoy the entertainment as a family, as a couple, alone or with friends. Built in an elegant Moorish style combining modern comfort and old-world charm, this sumptuous 4 star hotel provides a wide range of facilities and activities with a service that pays attention to every small detail to ensure that you have an unforgettable stay.Read more
property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

reviews.review_text: Hotel is good animation team excellent food okay lots of activities for all, no air con in room until June, overall drinks and staff are lovely, pool great  security on gates felt very safe, bed comfy think you very much Marco Polo perfectt very good

Amazing, 10/10 experience for anyone who is thinking of coming, entertainment team is so so amazing and so kind. Made my week in Tunisia so special!! The room, big pool, and food is just as amazing. Security is so good and keeps us all safe all day.

At check in I was told to come back in 1 hour for my room, 80 minutes later I return to reception and get told to wait another 2 hours, poor ! It’s a nice hotel but poorly run.

I stayed at the hotel for 7 days with my boyfriend and we were delighted with the hotel, the food, the service, the team of animators, everything is really at an enviable level! The staff is very friendly, everyone is smiling and in a good mood.

Great, entertainment team is the best u can get. People are so sweet and welcomming, weather is good its sunny and hot, pool is good beach is great so i advise you to come here as soon as possible you will love it. Willy is the best guy in entertainment team!!!

The welcome at the Marco Polo hotel was very warm from the staff who were always smiling and pleasant, both in the restaurant, as well as in the bar and maintenant. Hats off to the animation that is always attentive to customers with a smile and is very cervical. Tasty.

Marco polo was probably the best holiday i have ever been on. The animation team was so kind and easy to talk to. Pikatchou and Magi were so nice and funny. The team always got us doing archery and dancing at night which was amazing!! Overall an amazing trip!

The hotel is very good: very large swimming pool very clean, the food is good and varied.the rooms are spacious. Great animation team. The staff is very friendly and attentive and always with big smiles.  Very good stay....

Just on the last day of our 9 night stay here at the Marco Polo will be very sad to leave in the morning. Has been a fabulous break away from the UK in this family friendly hotel and even though our group was all adults we can't fault the hotel at all. Rooms are spacious and comfortable, facilities are spot on with a great pool with a swim up bar. A stones throw from the beach as well. All the staff have been so friendly and helpful from the waiting staff in the dining room, bar staff who keep you refreshed with a great selection of drinks on the all inclusive. Special mention to Oumymq who is part of the animation team who is an absolute diamond. She's been so helpful and friendly and it went a long way to making the stay so enjoyable. Kudos to the rest of the animation team as well, it's a tough job but the activities help break up the day.  Would certainly recommend this hotel to anyone thinking of coming to Tunisia and for an all inclusive break it can't be knocked.

Had a very good stay here, food very good and good change of food every day especially at night, the Brik (traditional Tunisian food) is such a highlight and I now want it every day 🤣🤦🏼‍♀️ Staff are very friendly, Sami and Hamdi are lovely and go above and beyond! All the staff do, but you obviously make bonds with certain ones quickly!  The animation guys are ace, didn't get all their names but Oumyma, mygi, and soleil were really friendly, helpful and fun! Pool is SOOO good, sun all day pretty much whenever your lounger is, beach a stones throw away.  Easy to get to from the airport. Only downside was the air con was broken apparently in the whole hotel for our stay, made it very warm at night in the room, but luckily could keep door open and the net curtain over. Didn't really change the heat, and definitely needs fixing asap!  Cleaners are all very lovely and rooms are clean.  The odd bit of maintenance needs doing in rooms/around the hotel with lighting, but over all a wonderful stay 💛💛

We had an absolutely fantastic stay at Djerba Plaza Thalasso & Spa. From the moment we arrived, we were seduced by the enchanting setting of the hotel, nestled in the heart of a beautiful palm garden, with direct access to a dream beach.  The staff is simply exceptional: welcoming, professional and always ready to help with a smile. Many thanks to the whole team for their kindness throughout our stay.  The room was spacious, clean, well decorated, with very comfortable bedding. We particularly enjoyed the calm of the place, perfect to recharge.  The buffets are varied, well presented and delicious. There is something for everyone, and Tunisian specialties are a real treat. Breakfast is also very complete, with a wide choice of fresh products.  The pool is huge and very nice, and the thalassotherapy center is a real plus to relax and enjoy the stay to the fullest. The private beach is superb, with its fine sand and turquoise waters.  It was our first time at Djerba Plaza, and certainly not the last. We leave with memories full of head and only one desire: come back very quickly! And thank you again to Erwan for his warm welcome and always smile.

reviews.review_text: Exceptional experience. The hotel has covered every possible aspect of hospitality on a family holiday (within their reasonable control).   Food? Superb Drinks? Flowing Facilities? Polished  Staff? Friendly, multilingual, always ready to help. The Animation/Entertainment staff in particular  are friendly and engaging, but never pushy. Every single member of staff we interacted with was at pains to make sure our son (5) was looked after, and having fun  Are there down sides? Yes.  Are they within the control of the hotel? No.   Insect bites are a pain, plastic in the sea and debris on the beach isn't ideal. But the staff are out on the beach every morning clearing and cleaning and making it as enjoyable as possible for everyone. Other reviews have dubbed the food as boring, or repetitive, or not hot enough, but ultimately this is the nature of buffet dining for a diverse multinational audience of vastly varying ages.   But there is nothing that can be expected of the hotel to change these very minor issues.   Further massive credit to the team of lifeguards. Attentive, engaged, and always working to look after the countless children on the water slides. Our 5yo tripped and grazed his knee and Emile carried him down 2 flights of stairs, insisted on disinfecting his leg and applying plasters, and wouldn't let him go until he was sure he was safe, happy again, and had a parent to hand.

reviews.review_title: Management in guests service  please listen to guests more seriously not just dismissive.

Cocktails was very watered down you had ask for more alcohol 🍸 😉 Please interduce pot for cups of tea not these cups that can't even make decent cuppa tea and real English Tea bags please. In corridors there are no security cameras only by lifts hotel didn't find that an issue.

reviews.review_title: Very nice hotel but could be better in some areas.
reviews.review_text: Just returned from a week at the hotel. We had a junior suite / the room was massive ( too big really and some wasted space) it had a sea view, but you also had a view of the roof. The bed was not comfortable it was hard, however I asked at reception if they could do something and they did put a topper in it, which was better. The hotel is plush in places, but some renovations are required. I saw some areas where there was damage, but tbh this didn’t impact in my stay. The restaurant was good, the food was really nice and I’ve read on other reviews that it was repetitive / this is a buffet, they are always the same, there was plenty to choose ( grilled meat/ fish/ Tunisian cuisine/ Indian/ pasta / pizza / fresh salad / and various desserts. The food was lovely. They have 3 themed restaurants- these are quite basic, and tbh could be improved.  The Italian for example- a set menu with two main courses ( who wants that)  Have a choice and add a salad and garlic bread! We didn’t go to the other themed restaurants as the menu was limited. The staff are the best asset to this hotel, All were attentive and couldn’t do more for you, especially Yassine in the restaurant and Mohamed in the bar. The beach is lovely but again they should clear the seaweed early or late on the day, no one wants to dodge the JCB walking along the beach.   The beach staff were excellent as well, the animation staff were jolly and they did interrupt your dinner, but I didn’t mind this they are drumming up support for the 9.30 show. I didn’t really like the dancing that they did but some people really enjoyed it - do it wasn’t for me but that’s fine. I would recommend it was a lovely week away.

reviews.review_title: Amazing, Friendly, clean, very well looked after x
reviews.review_text: From the moment we arrived we were very very well looked after. All the staff literally always had a smile on their faces and nothing, and I mean nothing was too much trouble for any of them. My friend has never done all inclusive before and the choice alone at the bar overwhelmed her a bit so the gorgeous barman made her a special and unique cocktail which was called Gills cocktail and that is what she asked for each time she wanted it and it was made the same everytime.   The food was exquisite,  no cross contamination to  be seen, beautifully presented, a great choice and literally something for all tastes.   The pool was lovely with plenty of loungers and parasols. The water was a little chilly but I guess that is because it is the  beginning of the season and it hasn't had enough sun to heat it up yet. There is a great poolside service and if you are that way inclined, you could literally park yourself in the morning and not move again till the sun went down.  Rooms - we had the standard room but it was perfectly adequate, the shower was good, air con effective I did have a really loud buzzing noise coming out of my wardrobe. I brought it to housekeeping attention and it was delbt with immediately. Housekeeping themselves were totally brilliant and our rooms were kept in tip top condition.    Entertainment - i have never really  been one for the evening entertainment  but my travel companion pursued me to go all but one night and I have to say I really enjoyed every night. Dancing and generally losing your inhibitions a bit, and nobody cares cause we are all on holiday and having a blast. The entertainment team work damn hard all day and all evening sometimes I wander how they stay awake and so energetic  with the ridiculous long hours they work.   So 8 nights gone in a flash of utter joy and happiness. I cannot recommend this hotel enough and will be talking about it and the fabulous staff for a while to come. I already miss them and I hope to return to see them all again in the not too distant future.  Bravo - Absolutely fantastic xx

The hotel was a nice hotel, clean and looks very like the pictures. There were a few down falls to it. 1.The buffet restaurant was average, it felt like it was really repetitive 2. The themed restaurant (Italian) menu was a set menu no choices but the wait times were ridiculous for simple food. We waited 30 mins from having our starter which was only tomato and mozzarella to geting our main course we had to ask where it was. They then skipped one of the courses for us. 3. The drinks on the first day were great proper cocktails, they then changed to pre made mixes which just tastes like water 4. The anamation team were very annoying, they would come to you while you were eating dinner and interrupt your meal to get to come to the entertainment nights. They also kept making the same comments to my partner about him being muscle and tall. It got annoying for him because it was every day the same people.  We did make a complaint at the hotel regarding the drinks and restaurant and they upgraded us to a prestige room. There wasn't anything really prestige about it it was the same as our first room just had a smart tv. The prestige bar area you get access to isn't very special either. Jaccuzi that don't work and seemed quite dirty when in it.  Overall the holiday was OK but the hotel definitely needs to take some things into consideration.  Also a beef burger was served to me with no beef it was only a slice of salami on it.  I would return however I would hope some of the points I've made would be taken into consideration

The quality of customer service is outstanding. All the employees whether it be: baggage handler, reception, housekeepers, bar and buffet staff really all are constantly at the small care it is really remarkable and most pleasant. The service around the pool or by the beach is a big plus especially with children. The friendly animation team beautiful energy. Our daughter had a blast at the mini disco and the color party. The staff at this hotel really love their jobs and do it wonderfully! Thank you all very much.  The buffet is amazing every day different dishes there is really something for everyone. Breakfast is fabulous fresh juice pressed before our eyes nothing like to start a beautiful day at this hotel.   Just a shame the indoor pool is not heated.  The room we had a garden view, the staff planted new trees all week and it's a good thing because it was a bit empty. Great bedding! Tv French chains mini bar well supplied for small and large. The bathroom is spacious just a lot of humidity which leaves room for a little mold and finishes leave a little to be desired but considering the time spent in this room it is not much. A big bravo to this army of people who make this hotel such a warm and welcoming place because considering the surface it is quite a job.  The hotel beach is really next door it is very clean it is well maintained and well guarded. For children there is everything you need beautiful outdoor structures as an interior in case of bad weather. The staff speaks French perfectly well. Great stay I can only highly recommend this hotel.

My partner and I visited here for a week's holiday to celebrate a birthday. The staff here made us feel so special and went above and beyond. They were truly amazing, especially Abdoo, Said, Mounir, Tibo.  The hotel grounds are lovely, and the rooms are well furnished. Everything was clean and nice. The food was delicious and a great variety, with some of your usual (chips, pizza...), lots of fresh fruit and veg, freshly made pasta, handmade deserts and pastries, and lots of lovely local dishes to try. There is also a Tunisian restaurant that is really nice, and it was great trying the local food.  There are nice pools, a lovely and clean beach, and plenty of sun loungers. There is a watersports shop on the beach where you can do activities for an additional cost, which was well priced.   Overall, this was a great place, and the staff made it that extra bit special and truly enjoyable. Definitely worth the visit.

Lovely hotel just want to review lobby bar clean airy and modern music atmosphere worth sitting, Oussema couldnt do enough for us lovely and gave us loads information still on holiday drinks are lovely from water coffee wine cocktails, further review to follow x

reviews.review_title: A real 5 stars to the top
reviews.review_text: 2nd time in 2 years in Kuriat. Always on top!  Very nice modern and large room, good bedding, sea view, mini bar with water, beer, coca, fantasy renewed every day. Large bathroom and beautiful shower. Free safe. Beautiful pool but really cold water. Nice beach. Many deckchairs always available everywhere. The restaurant is a real + from the hotel. Very varied cuisine, everything, and especially we ate for 1 week different dishes always succulent. And the really good breakfast and the ++: orange juice pressed in front of you!!! Very large terrace to eat there. And a really nice waiter, smiling and available: thanks to you Mohamed Salah 👌 the bars are numerous and never waiting because another one +: whether at the beach, pool, terrace in the evening, always a waiter to serve you.

A resort we would return in a heartbeat! The entertaining team is absolutely brilliant, hospitable, funny, and personable, making us all feel really special, eager to answer any questions and engage: special mention and shout out to Jackie, Semah, Manou, Phillipe, Pica and Zizo. Super funny, respectful, and inclusive. They also organised a trip by bus to Monastir: Manou and Bica were the group leads- despite their age, we were impressed with the level of responsibility and care. The food was absolutely excellent, fresh, and really tasteful. The room was very clean, and everyone with no exception could not do enough for us. We would highly recommend this hotel! It has been an unforgettable experience!

Super happy with our stay in Kuriat. Absolutely all the staff is at the top, always very friendly, smiling and ready to help!  We had taken a suite star prestige sea view, very disappointed on arrival .. the view was just horrible ... view on a land with garbage deposits..the sea yes but had to look well to the side to distinguish! Moreover the ventilation was super noisy not to mention the air conditioning ... we went to the reception and the next day we changed rooms! ouff I confess that our stay would have been ruined if we had been left in this room 551 and especially with respect to the price  So here we had the 554 which is just perfect from every point of view!  The buffet is very varied and very good!  We highly recommend this hotel!

A hotel with a human dimension and charming staff ... As far as room cleaning and service in the various restaurants are concerned, the employees are delicate and considerate ... I had a great time in the sun, with kind people ... I would like to thank Skander , Thamer , Monta , Mezri at the restaurant... And also a thank you to Ali who works at the bar ... All happiness under the sun of Monastir... Otalik …🐟❤️❤️❤️

the hotel is very good and very beautiful.  a big thank you to PIKA the facilitator who accompanied us throughout the week and who is very kind. the food and very good.  every night there are entertainments on whether for adults or children. I recommend this hotel.

name: Occidental Sousse Marhaba
property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

reviews.review_title: Thank you for our amazing time and beautiful memories.
reviews.review_text: I had an amazing time staying in this hotel. Staff are extremely friendly and helpful. Pool is very spacious and pool area is constantly clean by always smiling and very helpful lady Maha. Barr staff are excellent and will bring you drinks to your lounger. Massive thank you to Isam who was brilliant and took very good care of us. Rooms are spacious and cleaned daily. The restaurant has a large variety of food every meal time. Food was delicious and staff were brilliant and very attentive. FANTASTIC ANIMATION TEAM - Mogli, Smiley, Mino, Heidi (dont remember all names).Every day was different,  full of games and laugh. Great activities during the day (aqua aerobic, archery, darts, mini golf) and night (bingo, karaoke, theme nights). I was not bored for a second. Animation team were fantastic.  They are working so hard for so many hours to make the experience worth while. Staff will go above and beyond to make every guest's stay unforgettable. The only minus I found during our stay is lack of staff in reception. There is only one person working there so if you have any query to be resolved, awaiting time is quite long.

Great hotel for families. All the staff were very helpful and friendly across the hotel to make sure we were happy. Clean and tidy and gardens well maintained. The pool was lovely and where we spent a lot of our time and perfect for little children. Activities available to take part in throughout the day run by a fantastic animation team who worked so hard to get everyone involved and kept us entertained. We had a fantastic time and would definitely return.

An amazing hotel, all staff are extremely friendly and helpful. Bar staff are excellent and will bring you drinks by the pool. Extremely clean and looked after. Entertainment team are amazing and lovely. Rooms are spacious and cleaned daily by the lovely cleaning staff. Reception always helpful and will help to book activities and make reservations. Beach extremely close. Heated indoor pool. Samuel on the entertainment team ensured we had fun and made our holiday one to remember.

Very good experience, great animation team, and all staff are very friendly and helpful. Constantly something to do during the day and night for both adults and children.the rooms were nice and clean . The food was delicious 😋 specially tunisia 🇹🇳 food

If you want to enjoy your holiday don’t book this place. From the check in it was bad. The reservations manager ruined the stay from the start, so rude and unaccountable when booking wasn’t found that he confirmed that He made. Instead he was laughing behind the receptionist who was clearly in distress that she couldn’t find the booking.  Rude racist staff that ruin whole experience. Very accommodating for Caucasian guests and you can see that. Scowl when asking for water or glasses for the water which they stomp down on table. It’s almost like anything is too great of an ask. Wait around 20 mins for refill of cups or food at buffet. Ramzi and Ahmad were so rude and disrespectful to my family in the restaurant that managers had to intervene but even then they stand around bitching and complaining right in front of you. Pictures are incredibly misleading and the rooms do not look like images shown. Rooms are barely cleaned and towels look like they are flunged into rails. They don’t wipe or clean anything nor make the beds- nor change the sheets or glasses. On check out they don’t even ask how was your stay maybe because they already know it was a bad experience.   Things they don’t tell you:   No kettles included in rooms- need to pay 5Dinars per day therefore no cutlery or cups in room and if you ask the bar they will not give you any.   Iron- can rent for 1 hour when you pay a deposit like 40 dinars which they do give back allegedly   They do not provide towels for the pool or beach   Air con does not work till June so bear that in mind as you will also be dying of heat in the room  Only nice thing is grounds of hotel. Food is poor, no customer service and rooms don’t get cleaned. Beach is very dirty- red flag beach so can’t swim in it. AVOID

The hotel has many amazing activities during the night and day. The stuff are great and help out with the activities. The food is great and it has everything different food every meal. The Rooms are in great conditions. The whole place is in great condition.

Very great food, the best rooms, lovely staff. The staff are great with the kids. It has many activities during the day and there are lots of different events during the night for the kids and adults. The view is lovely. The room and hotel conditions are amazing. The restaurant has many types of food every day. The bar has many great drinks. The shops have many amazing things to buy.

Got back on Sunday from a weeks stay, hotel itself was nice, pool big and kids slides were open a couple of the times we walked round but they arent the best little one kept getting stuck on one of them as there wasnt enough water to push him down and got a bit of a mark on him from getting stuck, he loved the big pool so we just stared there. Signs all over to say no saving sunbeds but of course people did so it was a bit annoying!!   animation team were great - always trying to get people involved and were brilliant with kids. Kids disco every night at around 2030 was okay just very repetitive songs but i suppose thats standard. Then had a show on after at 2130 which varied from like bingo to dance shows etc  food was meh, there is something for everyone i think but i lived off spaghetti and chips and a bit of salad all week - probably took more precaution as I am pregnant so didnt want to go too far into the unknown lol... KFC around the corner lol   there's a fridge in the room which is handy as we used it to keep bottles of water etc in there - no dilute or anything for kids and fruit juice very limited so went to the shop and got our little one some from there and just kept it in the fridge and took his water bottle so he always had something to drink. I didn't have alcohol as pregnant so cant advise on that but hubs had the larger and said it was crap as tasted watered down.  no air con until 1st June so room was an absolute sweat box, especially first few days as reached 34 degrees which was just ridiculous!   left the hotel a couple of times and got harassed constantly and nearly kidnapped by a taxi driver when we asked to go into Sousse centre so then avoided going out from then on... There is also a shop at the hotel which sold pretty much everything from floaties for the pool to suncream, clothes, and gifts and snacks.  hotel staff themselves were lovely and polite, constantly saw the cleaners going round and cleaning up - no issues with our room, beds made every day with fresh towels.   Transfer time from Airport to hotel was about 40 mins so not bad. Went with EasyJet however didn't see one rep there once which is a bit of a shame as any issues there was no one to really help with any situations.

Very good hotel the animators are at the top 👍Immaculate bedding very clean hotel.I recommend it 🤗Very good location .Well maintained pool and for those who love swimming by the sea there only a few steps to do..super location 👍

My daughter and I stayed in this hotel in April. Initially the room we were given was not what we selected but quickly rectified the following day. There are so many positives to mention, the Aqua Aerobics, Swimming Pool, Sauna/ Fish Sauna and the beach which is walking distance also has its own activities like Paragliding. The receptionists were very accommodating, a few people to mention, Wiem, Randa, Hamza and Walid. Thanks to the security at the Hotel, we felt very safe as 2 single females. Thank you for making our experience memorable:-)

Very friendly staff, hotel is nice. Food is decent in a good way. Close to beach. Good entertainment for kids and adults. Indoor pool is good, not too busy and heated. Outdoor pool is also nice, the drinks provided for all inclusive are alright.

reviews.review_title: Nice hotel pity bout the  hygiene
reviews.review_text: Excellent bar staff, drinks  good  reception staff good .  The only complaint I had was the room was never cleaned was a shortage of towels one bath towel between 2.  One  day we never got a towel  and had to go to reception for  towels and toilet roll.    Don't think we would return for a few years till it was updated

Excellent hotel with amazing staff. Amazing sea view from our room balcony. Excellent facilities with the main pool, kids pool, entertainment and the private beach. A wide variety of food available for all to choose from. Waiter Mohammed Anni made our meal times amazing especially for our 4 year old who couldn’t wait for lunch and dinner each day to see him

Great value for money at this hotel food/drinks all decent and served by friendly staff (animation team worked tirelessly) pool area clean plenty of beds also the beach on your doorstep only gripes were air conditioner never cooled the room got a bit uncomfortable on the hot nights rooms could do with a freshen up also just had one socket in the room we had. Balcony door did not lock either apart from these small things it was a great stay

reviews.review_title: Excellent stay at the Occidental Sousse Marhaba
reviews.review_text: I recently stayed at the Occidental Marhaba, and the hotel is beautiful, with beautiful exteriors: clean pools, pretty gardens and direct access to the beach.  The room was comfortable, well equipped, and quality bedding.  The reception was warm; the staff at the reception are smiling, available and always ready to help.  On the food side, there is a choice: the buffets are varied and the dishes are good.  The atmosphere is great thanks to a team of animation at the top, funny and always motivated, whether during the day or during the evening shows.  Many thanks to them for a successful stay! I would definitely recommend this hotel and I would be happy to come back.

An exceptional holiday in your hotel. Very courteous staff always listening very smiling animators and work hard Good continuation guys we come back every year especially for the animation team ❤️❤️ I would like to thank the entire Western Marhaba team for a wonderful stay. I recommend with family , couple , friends or even solo 🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰

name: Mahdia Palace
description: Opened in 1996, this fabulous Palace of 5 stars lying on a 6 hectare site is located on one of the best beaches of Tunisia's coast. The MAHDIA PALACE THALASSO offers 452 rooms and suites inspired by the style of the Tunisian pure art. Located in the centre of the touristic area next to a turquoise blue sea and a sandy beach, the MAHDIA PALACE THALASSO offers modern comfort to its guests and a real sense of relaxation and well being. This mixture of modernism and tradition, associated with the harmony of colours and style is worthy to the warmth of this jewel of the city of Mahdia. Distance: 3 Km from the centre of the city, 55 Km from "Skanes-Monastir airport", 35 Km from the Coliseum "El Jem.Read more
property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

reviews.review_title: The greatest holiday in my life ❤️
reviews.review_text: I would like to say it was the best of the  best experiences that i had as a holidays , really was great atmosphere there from the views the beach and the room service a specially the animation team they was so kind and friendly i love how they treat as they make as so satisfed and happy Mr alex and Mr aziz and the others how they play with as and dancing briliant they make our holiday more amzing they will be always in my mind i apreciste it , thank for evreythings love you all 🥰🥰

Super friendly staff Perfect hotel to rest, small entertainment in the evening and also during the day The beach is beautiful and the water beautiful   Several choices on the food side, pizzas are better this year.  Many thanks to the staff of Fathie restaurant always ready to help as well as the waiters Saad and Ameur.  On the spa side it’s great, Doctor Nizard made me an excellent program and Maissa is a very good coordinator  Hamida in charge of Hammam is a love Bouchra and Samia are excellent masseuse  A mention also for Sonia aesthetic side  Can’t wait to come back very soon to see the most beautiful sunsets and meet the entire Mahdia Palace team.

Well organized hotel, varied dishes and very good quality, impeccable room service, impeccable cleanliness. Big asset: the covered parking. The only downside, the rooms deserve a refreshment. The general atmosphere is pleasant.

We liked it very much there...food was very good, very good mattresses, very good pillows and duvets. Nice room with balcony all clean. Pool very nice, nice beach. All people were very friendly. The Holtel corresponds to 4.5 stars but not 5 !! But that didn’t bother us...We had a great time and will come back:-) 😀

As I wrote for the other reviews, the real discovery was the beauty of Tunisia, both for the places and for the kindness and helpfulness of the natives. The Resort is very nice, a true 5 star all inclusive and boasts 3 swimming pools directly on the sea, 3 bars, various restaurant rooms and a beautiful SPA. Deck chairs and umbrellas are your choice and even if you go a little later you will always find a seat, maybe not right in the front row, and in case you need the lifeguards are very happy to help you find a seat. The food for us Italians, apart from the delicious and varied breakfast, is not really the top, as the is too spicy and repetitive. A special mention goes to the cooking of veal and grilled fish. The pasta is badly cooked. The rooms are spacious and comfortable, with international TV and very efficient mini bar, with two bathrooms each. We for personal reasons had it changed and in less than an hour we were given a new room. The staff is always friendly and willing to help, several times we had taxis called to go downtown... But the real gem is the Spa, we spent a magnificent afternoon, the relaxing massage of one hour was wonderful.  One thing to emphasize is the care for the customer: On the evening of my birthday they made me find a delicious cake with a lot of surprise. Thank you.

We came to Tunisia for the first time as a family. We went on an excursion with Ghazi’s proposal, he explained to us very well it was incredible, thank you very much to him, very adorable and guided us well! best guide! the hotel is amazing! all the staff are kind and kind, very family atmosphere. Chokri the best bartender, he made us laugh very much throughout our stay. Momo the animator offered us lots of different activities, and he was super nice and funny! we were offered to get massaged, the masseuses was great and the chef explained the different types of massage. Salah shows us around the city of mahdia and has the shop, very nice too. The waiters at the restaurant were super nice also, thanks to them, very helpful. Mohamed the bartender also thanks to him for his good humor! Maha the hostess guided us well and explained things, thank you to her. The jeweler was really amazing, great kindness. A big family! See you soon I hope incha’allah

Excellent location with excellent sandy beach, rooms comfortable and lobby area - it looks beautiful and cozy! Was part of a promotional tour of Tunisia. The service is good too! Lots of foreigners! There's animation. Married couples meet.

Great stay. Nice and available staff to guide and help us. A great stay spend with family. The animation team is great especially Nido ( hello 😉) Salah is a very good guide. Thank you again and it will be a pleasure to come back. Chouchou

First time in this hotel and it's the top of the line. Everything is perfect. Nothing to say. A special mention to mido who animates the evenings with brilliance and kindness. Animator at the top and with little care for his clients. A lot of laughter, it feels good. Hotel to recommend

Pro: Warm welcom Well made rooms Almost  acceptable food at the self Bad: Not heated common areas: corridors réception and self Inside swimming pool is very  small and without chowers New year's eve dinner very full and poorly  organised Not heated and Bad flow Water for hand washers and toilettes in Rooms

This place is just appearance Despite the large reception halls in Hollywood style you are then in a room with very, very old equipment questionable bathroom but above all a ridiculous restaurant Maybe the worst of the entire tour Absolutely to avoid.

Arrival at the hotel gives a magical look and the lobby confirms the impression.  The reception is warm and professional, the rooms are closer to a standard 4 French stars than a palace. The restaurant offers a quality service with “panagrastic” appetizers, the welcome is also very warm.  The indisputable black spot is breakfast where the welcome is execrable, the waiters turn their heads not to respond to your requests, the management waits with arms crossed....and at 10am very precise we put you squarely out, everything is dismantled.  This picture ruins everything else. Too bad.

Disappointing. It is obviously not a 5 star. Old and outdated decoration. Plastic, tiles, carpet and faux leather. Considering the spa rates, I couldn’t have expected much luxury. Doubtful cleanliness, no towel given to cover during massage...In November it is version 4th age German.

I don't want to write any details, otherwise it will be too long. I have certainly not experienced such a hotel stay. Unfriendly and absolutely inexperienced service in the restaurant. In the case of a legitimate complaint, an employee asks you if you have “drinken too much” for a glass of wine. Rooms seem run-down, carpets stained and everything a bit unkempt and uncomfortable. Opposite at night disco music until three o'clock at night.

reviews.review_title: Been to this hotel 2 years ago, I know that Tunisia and the 5th race are different things.Now this hotel is 3 stars!!! And in the restaurant, 2
reviews.review_text: Relaxed at this hotel two years ago, and it met the Tunisian 4.5. This time I can put 3, service, territory on this hotel. And I'm going to give the restaurant an A, I didn't know you could ruin any dish that was so bad, honestly, I've never eaten so disgusting.

name: Mahdia Beach & Aquapark
description: Everyone needs a place to lay their weary head. For travelers visiting Mahdia, Mahdia Beach Hotel is an excellent choice for rest and rejuvenation. Well-known for its quiet environment and proximity to great restaurants and attractions, Mahdia Beach Hotel makes it easy to enjoy the best of Mahdia. Guest rooms offer amenities such as air conditioning, and guests can go online with free internet access offered by the hotel. Mahdia Beach features a concierge, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a pool and free breakfast. If you are driving to Beach Mahdia, free parking is available. For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Mahdia, LTI Mahdia Beach Hotel is located a short distance from Mahdia's Old Town (2.8 mi) and Fort Ottoman Borj El Kebir (3.0 mi). While in Mahdia be sure to experience nearby French restaurants such as Vitamin Sea. Mahdia is also home to Mahdia Museum, a popular history museum that is not too far from Lti Beach Mahdia. Whether you’re traveling for business, pleasure or both, Mahdia Beach Hotel is sure to make your visit to Mahdia one worth remembering.Read more

reviews.review_text: Nice hotel with aqua park for any age. Staff was very professional and friendly especially animation team, they tried involved as many kids as they could. Great place for family holiday we really enjoyed and even celebrated my partner's birthday there with helpful restaurant crew (special birthday table decorations and cake)

Wow where do I start, the first hotel room we were allocated didn’t have a door handle and when I lent over the balcony wall I was covered in white paint, new clothes, no wet sign. We were moved to different room, the safe was broken but thought we would just hide valuables or take them with us.   The pool area is really nice and the staff are happy to help and there is a nice atmosphere there, snacks aren’t too bad there either. Probably the best part of the holiday.   The food/ buffet area is terrible on the 3rd day I suffered from food poisoning from uncooked chicken.   My son ended up with a black eye from the water park because a piece of apparatus was broken, no sign or tape, nothing to say is was broken. The staff did apologise but there was no first aid or accident book. ( I put ice on it myself to reduce the swelling)   I kept noticing my hotel room smelt like smoke then we came back to it after a day at the pool, we were gone from 8am- 4pm each day we were here. Then on the 4th day I noticed a packet of cigarettes had been taken from an unopened pack of 200 which I was taken home for a friend so I moved these into my suitcase, the 5th day I was packing my suitcase and I noticed another packet had gone. So the cleaner must have a thing for menthol cigarettes.   Overall please don’t go here.

We have not long got back from our holiday in Tunisia. We all spent a week at the Mahdia Beach & Aqua Park, and we found all staff at the hotel to be very friendly, from the cleaners to the animation team. The animation team need some praise as they really go out there way to make you feel welcome, learn all guests' names, and get you involved in all activities.   The hotel is very beautiful inside and kept very clean. The atmosphere by the pool was very relaxing, and the dj set was very good. Nobody was fighting over sunbeds. There was plenty for everybody. We really enjoyed the food near the pool area. The omlettes, fresh orange juice,kebabs, chips, tuna roll, crepes, and donuts were all very nice. The restaurant itself was a buffet style and it was up and down, some nights we got tired of the same thing and some things such as rice and potatoes wasn't cooked as to how we would of liked. The paella was delicious and the cakes. We really enjoyed the cocktails inside the hotel itself, and some of the liquors were nice. We did go out of the hotel some nights to eat. We really liked 'Roys' the food and drinks were lovely.   The evening entertainment at the hotel was good, it was something different each night. We liked the light show and Mj show.   The trips we went on were very good. We did quad biking, a visit to the colosseum, and we went on a pirate ship.   The hotel has its own private beach. It has the most beautiful sand. There are lots of sunbeds which are not at any extra cost. We felt very safe as there were a lot of security around the hotel and on the beach.  Our room was cleaned everyday and we really liked the walk in shower. The beds were comfortable and we had a balcony that we sat on some evenings before bed to relax.   The inside pool was lovely and we all enjoyed the water park, lots of fun!  Thank you to all staff at the hotel for a pleasant stay.

Fantastic hotel!! Great food..and I’m a fussy eater! The room was lovely. Top notch security felt very safe as I was travelling with just my daughter. The entertainment team was the best… I would guys to here it’s really beautiful place ❤️😍

Enjoying our stay here, great room and pools, with a big Aqua park. Hotel very clean and big.  Security is good  Hotel right on the beach. The best part is the entertainment team. I would love to see you here really it's amazing place and it's beautiful sea 😘😍🥰😊💖❤️

Is a good place for family holiday, drinks good,variety of food, good rooms, everything is security, good atmosphere, 1 min to the sunny beach.Good balance on money value. The stuff is really helpful and thei will mmake everything to make you feel very welcome. Best entertainment team.Look for William number 11🙂🥰😍🤪😘

My daughter was sick on arrival and the hotel staff refused to help me or listen, she swallowed her sick because she didn’t want to make a mess. receptionist refused to listen to me as the family at the desk were being very abusive dispute the fact I was alone with a clearly sick child and there were other children around listening.  Room below standard, phones across whole hotel apparently do not work so could not call reception. Balcony doors do not shut or lock  properly, mini fridge on floor rather than in the built in unit it should be. No air con.  Reception very very rude and no respect for women at all.  Awful start…. Do not come here without a man, I can’t believe I’m having to wright that sentence!

Before going I read so many mixed reviews, some didn’t like the food, others the cleanliness but in my humble opinion this hotel is absolutely lovely! I travelled with my mum and my two little girls and we loved everything! There is so much food to choose from (but I am a massive foodie and not fussy) and it is available all day. My girls loved being able to get food that they liked all day. Aqua park is just the right size for little people, without you losing them or running around looking where they are. Room was clean and towels changed daily (not a single cockroach was noted during our 10 day stay) Now let me focus on the service we received. ABSOLUTELY EVERYONE who works at that hotel was AMAZING! They work long hours and deal with a variety of clients and yet are always smiling, always polite, always willing to help. All waiters couldn't do enough for us, all life guards are alert and on point (I witnessed one life guard save a little toddler from drowning and his speed was out of this world!!), the animation team are brilliant! I must give an absolute special mention to Mimi and Ranyme, these girls are diamonds! Their work at kids club and kids disco left some special memories for my girls to treasure. They even let my ladies be their assistants on stage on our last night there. The beach was clean and beautiful! My family will be back to Mahdia Beach and I hope to see some of the amazing people who work there again!

We have got home from a fantastic 2 week holiday! Me and my family had the best time. All staff were lovely and helpful. Especially the animation team and their boss, always making sure we were all having fun. So many games to do throughout the day pool games, foam parties, beach games. My room was lovely and clean everyday, cleaners work really hard and so do the waiters. ALways making sure we were okay and if we needed anything. Brilliant hotel and all staff are amazing!! Can not wait to take my boy back❤

First visit to this hotel, 3rd visit to Tunisia.   The welcome and all the staff are warm, always smiling at the little care 🙂   The animation team deserves a 10 star rating! Little dedication to Rio, slim chaidi , Fernando, Willy and all the others.  Regarding the equipment and the environment, the pools are clean beautiful , a little cool the first days but it is normal we are only at the beginning of the season. The beach is beautiful, merchants are shipped by security to ensure the tranquility of holidaymakers. The rooms we had lack a little refreshing... The bathtub leaks, has trouble draining water, the beds were not made every day...   Small flat on the aquapark, it is outside the hotel, drinks and food are paid despite the all inclusive formula... Otherwise it is more than enough.  About the food, we ate well. Snack open from 10:18 am , pancake donuts all day. There is not a huge choice but the taste is present 😋   Second downside for the ambient noise especially in the evening, some holidaymakers abuse a little too much of the all inclusive and become disturbing for those who just want to spend a quiet evening with their children without hearing howling at the end of fields. A little more intervention by the security service would be desirable.  I think I summarized a good part of the stay and the hotel 🙃

A great stay with family and friends we loved, we will do it again without hesitation the animators are top , and the service and rather nice a small flat , very little (or no) fresh fruit at breakfast , and no hot water on the last day of our stay for the rest I thought it was great

This hotel is just the worst from the start arrived at 9pm at night tried to book in for the  2 prebooked rooms with 3 adults and 4 children including a n infant. 1 room was made available after midnight, baby had no were to sleep others were kept in reception until the next day 9am until making another payment of 1106.079 local money plus tourist tax for every party even with fully booking and making all inclusive payments back in UK or were getting turned away from hotel with nowhere to stay reception advised me 2 book another hotel because weren't willing to help without extra payment  No aircom in 30degree heat until June  If any1 thinking to go to waterpark need much money as have to purchase in aqua park as aren't allowed to bring from all inclusive including water  Make sure to put a towel behind door at night as u will have unwelcome guests ( giant cockroaches size of bank card) Entertainment is all over within 30mins so enjoy early nights bed by 10.15 max  not a holiday to be enjoyed  Locals cheeky on beach in local language

reviews.review_title: Great entertainment, but food and room could be better
reviews.review_text: The animation team were grate Shady oubeyd is very helpful, polite & talent.  The whole team kept us very entertained.  The water park was fun, children n teens loved it.  Honestly the food and rooms can be much better, I feel they should add more authentic ingredients of the country.

Very good stay very good staff hotel staff are very accommodating and the camel riding trip was very good the quad biking trip was very good and the photography of the family was very good also would recommend it for family’s with children I would come back again

I don't travel much, but I will definitely return to Tunisia, and especially this hotel! I loved every moment of it. It was a real experience; I am writing this story from the reception, as I prepare to leave after my 9-day trip. Here are the positive and negative points. Pros: The staff! Amazing, very friendly and welcoming. The service is excellent, the maintenance staff is adorable and the animation team! Legend. I have befriended many people and I can only say good things about them. The food was delicious. I am usually difficult, but they offered a wide choice of dishes, from beef spaghetti to cuttlefish ink! It sounds awful, but it was really delicious. The building is beautiful, it is a nice place to spend time with friends met on site or to sit and work. Animations. I can't tell you how amazing and unique it is to have an entertainment team at the hotel. These people danced, sang, organized entertainment.  You were able to learn dances to fun songs and have fun. There is an adorable DJ who can put on the songs you want, and many great people who show a big smile for you to have a great time!

reviews.review_title: very very good would come again
reviews.review_text: the holiday was good…amazing actually  nice place good time and fun activities to do all day and entertainment at night is brilliant too food is very good for variety but i’m a picky eater so i stuck to chips and pizza😂 there’s aquapark as well was amazing too overall it was amazing i would stay again

name: Nozha Beach Resort & Spa
description: Welcome to the newly redesigned Nozha Beach Hotel!We are thrilled to announce that the Nozha Beach Hotel is now under new management and is set to undergo a comprehensive renovation this winter season. Our ambitious plans aim to elevate your stay, promising a contemporary and rejuvenated atmosphere.All rooms are in line for a stylish makeover, embracing modern designs. The lobby and central bar areas are being revamped to create a more inviting and contemporary ambiance. Enjoy the poolside with brand-new sun loungers, ensuring your comfort and leisure.Introducing our latest gem, the beachfront restaurant "El Maro." With a capacity for up to 300 guests, it boasts an Ibiza-style setting. The restaurant will feature new furniture, buffets, a pizzeria, and a grill station, promising an unforgettable culinary experience.Not to be outdone, our à la carte restaurant "Kalamata" is undergoing a complete transformation, incorporating Greek decor elements to enhance your dining experience.Read more

reviews.review_text: Cleaning is superb, food is lovely, sun loungers are great, there is additional lounging facilities that are not featured in pictures, activities plentiful, large variety of food and bars, kids club could be more organised, staffed extremely well, sophisticated areas, kids disco, camel 🐫 rides, parachute 🪂, beautiful beach, excellent salon 💇‍♀️, hairdresser is fantastic, salon receptionist very personable, clean and modern facilities, animation team high energy. If you want wellness book this hotel! Something for everyone :)

upon arrival we had to wait over a hour for our room to be ready and someone should come and let us know.as time passed I think we were forgotten as I asked for our room and was given the key card straight away. the rooms are nice and clean the full hotel smells amazing cleaner's do a great job. as a family of 4 a bit more storage in the room would of been nice mabe bedside draws instead of tables. the food is ok I wish I could try more of it (nothing to do with the hotel) they cook most things fresh and some adults here right now will not wait and can be a bit inconsiderate when kids are trying to get some food.(again that's not the hotels fault)all the staff are present the pools and beach is very nice. no big scramble for sunbeds on a morning there is plenty to go around. there is a little shop on site and more outside. deposit is needed for beach towels. All in all we have had a great time here.

The animation team made the holiday. High energy and lots of fun. The hotel is clean, bright and staff are friendly. All ages had a fabulous time. Food was fresh and there is lots to do in the day and evening .Dancing, archery, darts and swimming.

The hotel is incredible: from the food to the view, its great. The animation team is very kind and interactive. The location is incredible also, its right at the beach and theres shops right outside the hotel which is very convenient. In general, I definitely recommend this hotel.

I was in room 3102 very good and helpful  cleaner  Hayet :*   good place, I prefer  adventure , not only spend time next to hotel so maybe that's way it's  good place, with family is alright, 3 or 4 bar, nice swimming pool, beach is a 100 meters frome hotel

Very clean hotel with a pleasant smell all over the establishment the staff very attentive always smiling and has our little care the animation very well and the beach restaurant overlooking the sea top of home top. The room is very nice and spacious with always a little attention on the bed (towel folded in heart, swan....) really a very big thank you  I recommend this hotel with my eyes closed

reviews.review_title: Amazing time, amazing staff, amazing entertainment
reviews.review_text: I loved the food, but for children they could of had more selection, as the twins I were with have autism, so kids with this, are fussy. Apart from that the hotel is very clean, the cleaners are lovely.  The Animation Team The boss Mido, speaks many languages, and puts together the entertainment, The Naughty, but cheeky Simo, he should be called wicked and thats in a nice way, he entertained us and everyone around, so beware people, he's lots of fun, the beautiful Doussa, very helpful, even went for an after drink with her, she helped in all ways she could. Of course  Nader, with his hair, smile and his cheeky side, great dancer to. The wonderful GiGi, absolutely amazing with the children,  with her crafts and toys for all ages, the kids miss her, that says it all with tears and cuddles.  And Amine, they call him Giraffe, what a lovely man, fun, enjoyed dancing. Tho the team are not professional, actors, dancers the entertainment was brilliant, which was all down to Mido, he loves his job, but the work they all put into it, you can only praise them.  The bar staff were brilliant, I have never been to such a home felt hotel, tho small, it was ideal, as all the staff helped in their own ways. I'd highly recommend, and I will certainly go back, I know some people have already booked next year and going for 3 weeks next time.  Yes I would do 3 weeks myself to.  Highly recommend

reviews.review_title: A beautiful place with an amazing atmosphere where you just want to spend your holiday! Thank you all for everything!
reviews.review_text: We stayed with you for 10 days with two small children and I am really glad we went to your hotel! Despite the longer transfer it was really worth it! Beautiful setting, renovated and clean rooms, very nice and ! SMILING ! staff and above all the best animation team we have ever experienced! pokthanks mily due ablasi w mainly due at'thanks A truly incredible team! Thank you for everything, especially you Foufa! Our son really loves you and to this day he still asks where Foufa is. Our daughter has become very friendly with Sunny and Sainab. It didn't matter at all that our kids only speak Czech. They found their way to each other.  Our big thanks also go to the others, not only to the animation team, the very nice and helpful maid, the receptionist and the really helpful, smiling and hardworking waiters and the best pasta chef right on the beach.  Tip - it would be good to focus on the cleanliness of the kids club, the safety of the climbing frames, the cleanliness of the beach and maybe find a way to not use so much disposable plastic on a daily basis!

reviews.review_title: Do not change everything is perfect
reviews.review_text: We enjoyed our stay from 17 to 24 May for the quality and kindness of the staff  Congratulations to Chef Hatem and his team for the quality of the buffet for so many guests as former GO it's like Club Med  Congratulations to the staff for keeping the hotel in a state of impeccable cleanliness  Our stay was short so nice  We recommend your hotel to our friends  Greetings  Marcelle and Christian

Thank you for this pleasant stay spent from May 13 to 20, 2025 room 3105. The staff was always available and pleasant ready to respond to all our requests. A special thank you to Eliette who I hope will be recognized for her kindness and these beautiful decorations in our room. The facilities and bars/restaurants delighted us with the quality of the products offered for catering and cocktails.  Entertainment every night at the top.  Disappointment on swimming too restrictive on the beautiful beach even in calm sea.  Thanks for everything.

We just spent an ideal week at the nozha beach. Very nice hotel, smiling staff and little care with the holidaymakers. A little special nod to Soulef (who looked after our room 2102) who surprised us with his decorations. Pleasant, kind and smiling person. I recommend the hotel 1000 percent. On the other hand, only downside with Karim (world tourism representative) who once sold us his excursions, remained indifferent throughout the stay. Did not tell us about the operation of the hotel, gave us no explanation, which is a shame. It does not represent the atmosphere of the hotel which is however perfect. For us, this is a negative. Apart from that, congratulations to all and thank you for your welcome.

reviews.review_title: Very nice experience!!! Good stay in this hotel
reviews.review_text: A place where we had a great stay in this Hotel where we were welcomed with open arms and a kindness that is really pleasing..all the staff puts themselves at your disposal for everything you desire and always with a smile 😃  The least worries there is always a solution  Cleanliness is in order   We pay a great tribute to Mrs. SILHEM maintenance worker who always smiles accompanied by a very nice little word...the rooms are impeccable made every day with great care and attention  A great tribute also to the staff of the restaurant..of the bar..animations..etc... Too bad our stay was so fast!!!!  I highly recommend

The best holidays which we have. Hotel clean and food you can find for everyone. Animation team is amazing, you will be busy from morning till evening,evetyone will find what to do. Specially big compliments to Blacky. Evening programmes are every day different.

reviews.review_title: Everything was perfect. to do again without moderation
reviews.review_text: Chambre.ambiance.prix.qualite.propeté Service.everything was excellent.I do not regret my stay the waiters and maids are taking care of us as well as the animators who put a lot of atmosphere and are attentive and kind. Do not change anything

Great stay, karim as well as all the staff is in the small care for us... beautiful hotel, clean... different leisures galore, both inside and outside. ..In short, to force to find his happiness...I would return with pleasure...thank you 💖

My husband and I are very impressed how wonderful team works in this hotel. Reception, room service, restaurant and animators 10/10. Very kind and helpful people.  We've travelled as a family of five and kids were so happy playing with animators especially with a lovely girl Zeinab. Beautiful out and inside, with good touch for children.  Our youngest daughter called her aunt and didn't want to return to Poland, just wanted to stay and play with Zeinab. The best aunite ever!!! Our daughter can't wait to see her again.  Hope we come back next year to this hotel and all wonderful people we've met there.

Just returned from a two week holiday at this lovely hotel, we had a great time. The hotel staff are so polite and friendly, the food is great and the grounds are massive with lots of sunbeds and umbrellas and also leads onto their own sandy beach. The hotel and grounds are constantly being cleaned and the outside seating area is lovely. What really made our holiday was the 'Animation Team' with their happy attitude, their dancing poolside and their general happiness which was contagious they are a credit to the hotel.

name: Seabel Rym Beach
description: Enjoy an outstanding seaside resort experience in the northern coast of Djerba island. At the foot of the Taguermess light-house, the Renovated Seabel Rym Beach, is located on the prime white sandy beachfront & set in the heart of an 11-hectare palm grove. It is 6 km from Midoun, 15 km from Houmt Souk, 20 km from the airport and 3 km from the Djerba Golf Course (27 holes).Read more

reviews.review_text: The staff is attentive, impeccable service  Good atmosphere, many activities ,  Large and clean room, decent bedding, quiet The downside, the AC wasn't working.  Various buffet , theme buffet, Tunisian dish, very good fish.  Nice and clean beach

reviews.review_title: A stay that leaves us with an excellent memory
reviews.review_text: Couple stay. Hotel on a human scale. Ideally located for the departure of your excursions. Cleaning, maintenance, catering and bar staff and entertainment team always smiling and kind. Very well equipped for classic activities. Superb outdoor and indoor pool. The animations are also at the top. We do not regret the choice of this hotel that we will recommend around us. Many thanks to all of you. Thanks also to Mr Chaker Daoui our contact Mondial Tourisme without forgetting our various drivers and guides.

We had a great time. The staff is very nice, the animators very friendly.  The facilities around the pool: deckchair, table tennis, billiards, archery, boules, .... and the beach are perfect. The food is perfect, varied, well cooked.

Nice hotel , human size , clean and accessible to all including the disabled.  Very good food , varied dishes , theme evening . Animations every day for those who wish. Nice swimming pool , deckchairs pool and beach , a very well maintained beach . 3 years that I go at the same time and never disappointed! The beach infrastructure is evolving and it remains friendly and warm! Special mention for SPA , this year a crush for Mounia and the young man! Go there with your eyes closed: cure , massages is the little corner of paradise, they have fairy fingers thank you!!! Every year their services are top! I recommend!!! And for those who evoke negative reviews, it remains incomprehensible;) everything is done to have a very pleasant stay!

Very good hotel, impeccable waiters, excellent food, good beach nearby and nice room. Perfect animation. Just missing tables at the restaurant of 2 or 4 people,because many with 6 people. Other than that, there's nothing wrong.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful stay for our 45 years of marriage
reviews.review_text: We are retired and had a great 3 week stay at Seabel Rym beach. Ideal location, very nice beach, varied food and pleasant staff. A big special thank you to Mohamed our housekeeper who particularly spoiled us for our 45 years of marriage (see photo). We will return in October very surely.

Very very good stay at the beach rym , an exceptional welcome, all the staff is at the small care , of an unparalleled kindness, very good restaurant, animators at the top , mention to mohamed Amine who does a huge job always close to customers, despite the late arrival he organized us a small arrival meal, thank you to all and do not hesitate one of the best hotels on the island of djerba

reviews.review_title: Very good hotel, excellent level of all services.
reviews.review_text: The SPA is of good quality, the staff very attentive. Nothing is missing from the restaurant. The housekeeper had an inspiration and a gift for beautifying the exceptional room. Information for animations could be more important.

New mattress in the rooms, swimming pool deckchair, fresh orange juice in the morning, furnishings on the beach brief as positives. Even the indoor pool wasn't heated although the hotel insisted that it was.  The private section of the beach is clean.  The food apart from breakfast is very poor quality.

Hilton  Pros - modern decor. Nice beach.   Cons - poor service and here’s why;  1. There are lots of staff rushing around but not doing much - dirty / uncleared tables - Had to repeatedly ask waiters to clear dirty tables in the canteen (worse than a school hall).  2. You’re lucky if you get offered a drink in the canteen or terrace. Again there are lots of young (mostly male) staff rushing around but not really serving guests. Although I note female, younger guests do get served fairly quickly.   3. The room was cleaned but there were hairs on the floor which were not ours! .  4. The sink blocked and we had to ask for repair (not repaired and we had to use the lever under the sink to unblock manually).  5. The towel holder glued to the shower come off (not repaired)  6. The bedding wasn’t changed at all during our week stay.   Food  - plenty of it but tasteless and limited hours:  1. Food was repetitive  2. On arrival at 10pm no food available. No room service.  Usually when I’ve stayed at other 5 star hotels options are available for guests.    Location - nice beach no amenities nearby and very dirty  1. Do not go here if you like to get out for a walk or visit a nearby coffee shop/ bar restaurant. There aren’t any. The hotel is surrounded by derelict / abandoned building projects.   2. The whole area and surrounding town / Monastir is very dirty. There is rubbish strewn everywhere.  We went to look at the nearby flamingo site. It is surrounded by rubbish and a rubbish dump.   Overall - I wouldn’t book this hotel again unless there are major changes to the service and operation.  I would go back to Tunisia as the people are lovely  just not here to this hotel. I recommend really considering this place if you want a nice vacation this is not 5 star Hilton.

name: Phenicia Hotel
description: Beautifully situated on the east coast of Tunisia, Phenicia hotel spreads between a fine sandy beach and a garden of 11 hectares where mix generously palm and olive trees. For your comfort, the rooms of the hotel all endowed with balconies or terraces offer you fantastic views between the gulf and mountains of Hammamet, swimming pools or gardens. The hotel has several restaurants and a wide range of activities to choose from, such as 8 sand tennis courts. Windsurfing and sailing must be booked in advance at the reception desk during summer season. 1 hour of tennis is included per day in all-inclusive. Tennis must also be booked in advance at reception. The hotel's hosts organize professional shows and make your stay exciting with interesting competitions. And whoever has not had enough by the evening can take off to the dance-floor in the hotel's own nightclub, Le Théatre. To stay in touch with your relatives and friends, WIFI is free of charge all over the hotel even on the beach.Read more
