We were very excited by the reviews and the score of the hotel. We booked in TUI for May 16 for 7 days. I'll quote the hotel's good and bad points. Excellent staff strive to serve the guest. Very clean common areas in marble and walls in Arabic style. The best the SPA is luxurious with modern whirlpool chambers, sauna, jacuzzi and other excellent quality services in addition to the staff q attend. The food is varied and the pastry part super. Negative points the standard alcoves are small, the balcony also, no air conditioning, towels and sheets do not change them it is time to ask for the change. The bathroom is medium level no toiletries just a soap and a plastic hat, no makeup mirror, the fridge is very old and poorly located, no coffee maker. The bed has 2 small pillows and does not put a bedcover. This is the worst point. The beach is removed from the hotel, it is time to walk along a path, there is no animation on the beach. Regarding the attention if it is true that there is preference for English customers since they are the majority. We were given some of the worst rooms.  Conclusion hotel with specialty for English, senior citizens in the majority. For us a 3 star hotel no more.

One of the best hotels I stayed in the staff absolutely amazing everyone is friendly helpful and professional. Service staff restaurants and bars very friendly and helpful I can name every single one will take ages. Recaption staff very helpful and accommodating. Our house keeping Maysaa was very helpful make sure everything in order last but not least especial thanks from animation team best entertainment team I ever see Chico, Hamouda, Mr bean, Mady, Akram, Chatti, Meryam, Mario. Over all very excellent experience made me feel like home.

We stayed here last week. The hotel is clean and modern with two lovely outdoor pools in well kept gardens. We didn’t use the indoor pool. There are plenty of loungers and it didn’t feel overcrowded. We had a pool view from our balcony, the room was amply sized and immaculately clean. The food was excellent and varied all week, we met the head chef who was lovely and even offered to cook specially for my partner who is gluten intolerant. There were some gluten free options available daily including bread and desserts as well which were kept separate. All of the staff were friendly and polite and the entertainment team were great, engaging but not pushy. Great value for money. We’ll be back.

This is a vast complex with every facility you could desire for a holiday. The check-in was fast and efficient with luggage assitance to your room. Rooms are nice and spacious and well maintained with a good sized TV including UK Channels, Fridge and  a bathroom with fresh towels daily and shampoo, soaps etc.  The hotel has a vast range of facilites including a seawater indoor pool, spa and gym (extra cost) and a selection of indoor and outdoor bars, kids club and outdoor snacks. There is also a private hotel beach with a bar a short walk away. All ther staff are amazingly friendly and greet you when they pass. There is a huge shop in the hotel that has all the stuff you might have forgotten to pack plus a big range of local sovineers. Dining here iis amazing, food is top quality and the selection is vast at all meal times. You can choose  to eat in the dining room or the cafe with waiter service or enjoy a paninni from the pool bar. Soft drinks and coffee are branded products like Coca-Cola and Nescafe but the spririts and beer are local varieties, but not bad!  Every day there are lots of activites organised by the animation team including darts, french bowls, water exercise etc. The animation team are amazing and work really hard to encourage guests to have fun on holiday. Special mention for Mr Bean who does the french bowls and he works hard to make everyone feel comfortable whilst playing the games. This is a Tui hotel and it has to be mentioned that they provide supeb support at the hotel and whilst travelling. My first time in Tunisia but I will return as the security is good, people are friendly and the value for money is excellent. Royal Kenz gets a 9/10 from me overall.

We are here  at the moment and we were here in September 24, tonight we were at the Changinng Ladies show what a wonderful evenings entertainment thankyou to all concerned  for a brilliant night.Over the years we have stayed at the Kenz on many holidays and  it is one of the best hotels we have ever been in.The whole staff from reception to maids go the extra mile to make sure you have a wonderful holiday.We still have another week of  our holiday to go at this special place,great staff,good food,good rooms and entertainment who could ask for anything more.

I have spent an unforgettable week in the hotel , It was an awesome experience, I have really appreciated the place , very clean and with positif Vibes , amazing animation , especially chatti  and amigo , the staff are very professional , the food was very good. Big yes for this hotel

Beautiful hotel, kept very clean and everyone is so welcoming.   Entertainment is amazing. Lovely spa, would highly recommend trying it out. Food was all displayed lovely, especially the cakes. All fresh and tasted good. Room 40 I stayed in. Good location and near everything.  Would defiantly come back and stay.  Thank you for making my holiday great

My experience was unfortunately bad I would like to fix it in the future Reception : Distinction between foreigners and Arabs in treatment and the color of the blankets to discern and even carry luggage while I was with my husband and little girl. For rooms : Not all services as an alien !! An old bed with spots, a white towel quality, and a fresh, blue alien spots. Restaurant : Foreigners are greeted with a smile and service without a request, but the yellow wagon holders are the same and the workers are worried about even the tables in terms of adjustment and the quality of the wagon and knives, so that the water is cold for foreigners and hot for yellow wagons.

reviews.review_title: Not a four star too many little imperfections
reviews.review_text: It was sold as a 4star hotel,in my humble opinion it scrapes a 3star rating First the good points Animation team first class not too pushy but very approachable always with a smile and a kind word.Food fine good variation on occasions in need of reheating.Environment spotless,plenty of sun beds or chairs if required. Both outdoor pools slightly cool,stated heated didn’t feel heated. Room ok beds horrid felt like sleeping on boards.My mains issues were with the drinks,only 1each of local Whiskey.Rum,Gin and Vodka available no other drinks several cocktails not made fresh ,asked for a Bloody Mary but didn’t serve tomato juice once more most 4star hotels would provide these little extras.Second bribe is the glasses no issue with plastic glasses by the pool area but these were small tumblers serving about a third of a pint.In the main area lager served in small half pint glasses again something you would expect in a 3 Star establishment. You could get lager glasses if you asked for them once more you shouldn’t have to ask.My wife visited the Spa and stated it was exceptional she paid 85 Tunsia dnr .In conclusion some aspects suggest a special hotel but overall it’s the minor issues that spoil this hotel ps nighttime entertainment leaves a lot to be desired,for example on bingo night we were charged 20 Tunsia  Dnr (£5)for a sheet of bingo cards ,they must have sold at least 100 three prizes given out for the first game prize T-shirt Prize for second game bag of hotel goodies and for winning the third game a 30 minute massage just not sure what happened to all the money took on the night (2000 Tunsia Dnr (£500) Thus once more does not reflect 4star entertainment Final complaint Tv only 1 English station out of 40+ channels As stated ok hotel but not 4 Star it falters to deceive

reviews.review_title: The entire team of TUI SUNEO ROYAL KENZ
reviews.review_text: Hotel perfect excellent reception team Mohamed .Imed ... Very welcoming smiling excellent 🕺  The food super good impeccable room So no children to run everywhere and scream, so calm found. This is my first experience at this hotel and it was really excellent.

Excellent hotel, excellent restaurant, excellent staff, excellent amenities, excellent room,  We had the best week ever. The hotel was absolutely spotless, the staff very friendly & extremely polite. The view from our room was lovely. A 5 minute walk to our own private beach.  I can’t the hotel in anyway. Absolutely brilliant. We will definitely be going back.

Very attentive and friendly welcome! The staff is non-stop to the small care ... The Thalasso center is wonderful and divine care ... I had the care of the nurse and the doctor, having been ill, the care was quick and effective ... Meals come with lots of choices for everyone! I had my hair done, it was also impeccable... The location of the hotel is close to interesting local shops... What else can I say? Everything has been positive and look forward to coming back for a week of real relaxation!  Thank you for everything!

Absolutely brilliant stay at this wonderful hotel.  Can't fault anything, the hotel is spotless (our room was really well maintained), the food was th best I've had at an all inclusive,  and the staff were exceptional.   The gardens are lovely and the private bit of beach with the bar and toilet facilities is great.   Will be booking to come back next year and can't wait!!

name: Hasdrubal Prestige Thalassa & Spa Djerba
description: See why so many travelers make Hasdrubal Prestige Thalassa & Spa Djerba their hotel of choice when visiting Houmt Souk. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a family-friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.As your “home away from home,” the hotel rooms offer air conditioning and a minibar, and getting online is easy, with free wifi available.Guests have access to room service while staying at Hasdrubal Prestige Thalassa Hotel. In addition, Hasdrubal Prestige Thalassa Hotel offers a pool and free breakfast, which will help make your Houmt Souk trip additionally gratifying. And, as an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.Should time allow, Fort Ghazi Mustapha is a popular historic site that is relatively easy to get to.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Hasdrubal Prestige Thalassa & Spa Djerba as you experience all of the things Houmt Souk has to offer.Read more
property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

reviews.review_title: Nice hotel but improvement to give ...
reviews.review_text: Very nice hotel, lovely and kind staff but not insignificant; the restaurant lacks fantasy, buffet rich in fresh vegetables, variety and presentation. Room service poor for this category of hotel.  Thank you for the welcome.

reviews.review_title: Luxury Hotel and Thalasso on Top
reviews.review_text: Spacious and luxurious room , refined decoration, beautiful marble and mosaic bathroom , worthy of a palace .  In addition, superb terrace with open views of gardens and sea.  I particularly appreciated the quality of the restaurant: refined fish dishes, Tunisian pastries... I will keep an excellent memory of the personalized welcome of the hotel guests , the involvement of the staff, attentive and diligent servers , managers attentive to the smallest detail and who ensure the satisfaction of the guests .  The maids do a neat job (thanks to Mrs. Ismahene attentive to every detail).  I will probably return to this establishment mainly because of the exceptional services in Thalasso (unforgettable massages by Mr. Salah , extremely gifted and professional and which contribute to the excellent reputation of this thalasso center as the best in Djerba.

reviews.review_title: An ideal week for well-being and rest
reviews.review_text: I return after a warm and very good stay of a week.  A total rest , a superb setting (outdoor interior) . All the staff is extremely kind .Whether at the reception (reception ), at the restaurants , at the bar, the cleaning service of the suites and the maintenance , all provide an efficient service of quality . Thanks to them!  In short , the Hasdrubal Prestige contributes to the reputation of Djerba called "Djerba the Sweet"

Superb and personal hotel of absolute kindness. The rooms are really luxurious if we ignore the small maintenance details not carried out.  On the other hand, unfortunately, freezing room with barely 18.5 ° despite heating (totally inefficient reversible air conditioning) at most, . Taking advantage of it naked is simply not possible. An extra radiator was put in the bathroom to allow us to use it (we usually shower naked 😄). We will not come back again at this time of year, for sure, because our pleasure is wasted... And as the payment of the stay is made upon arrival, impossible to shorten the latter 😒

Great location excellent friendly and professional staff only small catch is the feed there is progress to be made and above all it would be necessary that the waiters respect the orders   Close to the casino  Golf by taxi or hotel driver

reviews.review_title: Hotel to avoid, despite very good care at the thalasso.
reviews.review_text: The worst thing for me (if he had a flight home I would probably have interrupted my stay): what some call "music", namely a sequence of rare notes without soul, without character, repeated every minute, what I say, every 30 seconds, for hours, every day the same. And impossible to escape, I could hear them from the balcony, in some parts of the park, during breakfast, during treatments... and even at the Moorish cafe! There were only in the "administrative" parts, reception for example, where one could escape. It was to the point that I woke up in the morning to hear those notes in my head. For me unbearable. This music seems to be a problem for the staff: during the treatment, when I asked to turn off the speaker in the room to hear only what was coming from the hallway, the person concerned would tell me either that he had not heard these sounds, or harsher words like "it breaks my head" (sic).  There are also some shortcomings on the part of the staff, shortcomings are difficult to understand in a hotel of this category, in particular: •	personnel who walk into the room at great strides without announcing themselves, which happened 3 times while I was in the room and which must have happened also in my absence. You can imagine the embarrassment of being half naked in front of a lady. •	at the reception, where requests are properly received, but without more, followed by broken promises, twice out of three; an example: since my robe has been removed without being replaced and there is no cleaning lady in the corridors, the reception, to which I have indicated that I will have treatment in less than an hour, told me that the necessary action will be taken immediately. Now 10 minutes before the treatment, nothing; I then decided to go around the building, finally coming across a charming person who helped me. When I returned from the care, there was still no bathrobe...  •	at breakfast the services are systematically removed as soon as they are served again, without the managers wondering if the customer will still need them, so without thinking about either leaving them or replacing them.  I still want to point out that the care was very good and the staff generally friendly and smiling, except at the reception, except for the very friendly person who received me on arrival.

Not worth the 5 stars awarded. You should think about renovating the furniture of the rooms but even more to dust them (being allergic, I digested well from my arrival). I understand that we are out of season, but good from there to close everything except the lobby bar.. Very average catering, it was necessary to announce to your customers that dinner would be served in the à la carte restaurant (1 starter, 1 course, 1 dessert) instead of the buffet before collecting the Half Board fee, something that is a scam in my humble opinion. Caring staff despite the austerity measures imposed.

Nice hotel with beautiful gardens and beautiful outdoor pools, but aging on some services. Great very nice suite with terrace but used bedding and despite our request to change it, nothing was done. Coverage provided stained. Problem with the use of the TV, which worked very badly (complicated channel change and awful sound). Thalasso very well with a great staff welcome. In the off season, not all restaurants are open.

reviews.review_title: Very good hotel for thalassotherapy, catering to improve
reviews.review_text: Excellent Thalasso treatments, competent and friendly staff, a large indoor seawater pool with magnificent hydrotherapy.  Outdoor swimming pool also top, beach that unfortunately lacks maintenance despite the staff who go to great lengths to settle us well.  Beautiful room, great spaces, impeccable services and cleanliness. Very quiet place.  Catering, the weak point, promise of five restaurants when in reality only one is open for lunch and another for dinner. Besides, the cuisine lacks flavor. Decent breakfast.  Perhaps we should go to this hotel in high season, we felt that some services were suspended.

Exceptional service room sound top personal very welcoming and warm  Cleanliness small note for the service of MR Abdel Waheb with Anoir who prepared us superb cocktails and incredible kindness thank you very much

Loyal customer of the 5* djerbian hotel from 2006 to 2018, after long stays at the Hasdrubal d'Hammamet from 2019 to 2024, including during COVID, I return with pleasure to the Hasdrubal Prestige to find and find:  - great comfort, calm and serenity - select clientele with a large European majority, respecting the Dress code of this magnificent 5* - exceptional thalassotherapy center, the best I know in Tunisia - the many outdoor swimming pools in freshwater, seawater and thermal water, in the form of independent lagoons - a general management and a reception desk ✌️ -a restoration 👍  An excellent stay at all levels; definitely the next 👏

We stayed with my girlfriend for 8 days at this Pension. I highly recommend if you want to be tempted by several Things to do. You will be served by lotfi in the Inn and it is raouf who will take care of you to accompany you and make the most beautiful walks on djerba! So we were able to do quad biking, horse-drawn carriage, camel horse, desert visit,... we will keep all these images in our heads forever! A pleasant experience with people in gold! You can trust them with your eyes closed!

We stayed 8 days at this Inn, we did Things to do with a gentleman named RAHOUF and LOTFI perfect nothing to say! We were strolled, visit the desert, quad, camel, carriage,...! It was just perfect I Trip Tip this gentleman if you have the opportunity to do it with him nice and super nice I highly recommend!! ☺️

Back from a new stay at this Pension. My review is still as positive.  The staff is very attentive, everything is done for your well-being. I always Rating the extreme kindness .. of all the reception staff (olfa, Alia , Adel ) at the restaurant (Ali Houcine Sabri Hassem Mehdi  Some health concerns and I was able to find from all the necessary comfort and availability of staff. I have benefited from treatment doctor , clinic nearby .. Bravo for the beachgoers and those of the security of the place .!!!!and Anouar ...always impeccable, efficient and smiling!   At this time, quite a lot of people at the hotel; despite this, the calm, the  tranquility reigned there. Improvements to note .... at breakfast ..at the beach ..  Congratulations also for the thalassotherapy care ... competence , benevolence: a very beneficial moment! Anyway, I just think about going back!

three weeks dream....I know this hotel since it opened in 2008. We go twice a year to meet our friends who receive us as if we were family. I would just like to thank all the employees who made our vacation 3 weeks of happiness. at reception: Olfa,Alia,Adel Ali. the boy to young: Hassem Ali. At dinner: Sabri  at the beach: Anouar, Chadi.  My friend Djamel the king of restaurants  and especially Raouf the general manager always present and who even this little world like a conductor. the beach is beautiful the garden and the indoor seawater pools are beautifully maintained. I would give special mention to the thalassotherapy and its surprising indoor pool supervised by Mrs. Rhim and her competent staff.  We have only one wish to return as soon as possible to this little paradise.

Since our last stay in 2022, we have seen a lot of improvements: beautiful breakfast buffet with a huge choice of breads, juices, pastries, Tunisian pastries, cold cuts, cheeses. Orange juice is always pressed on request as well as the preparation of pancakes, Tunisian donuts, various egg recipes.  A lady bakes Tunisian bread. To note the superb maintenance of the beach and congratulations to Chadi, the beach attendant, who is in the care of the residents. The garden is beautifully maintained. All the staff is always as pleasant and dedicated. R. LAMBERT

Thank you to the entire Hasdrubal Prestige team. Second visit and always as pleasant. I would like to thank Adel, Alia and Olfa, as well as all the other staff. This Inn is a luxurious nugget: you feel peace and tranquility. The service is impeccable, as well as the maintenance of the rooms, not to mention cleanliness. The Breakfast buffet is a must. Thank you very much for this extraordinary stay.

Everything to our complete satisfaction, a very warm service staff.... Above all the pool bar, thanks to Abdel, who can read every wish from our eyes. Our grandmother enjoyed every second with the restaurant staff as well as Abdel us camel.... Thank you very much, we will see you again soon🙏🙏🙏🙏🙏Ichalla

a hotel that I do not recommend at all, the management, the lack of responsiveness on the part of the management are a shame!!! I don't know who they think they are, but one thing is for sure, they don't deserve to work in the hotel business. For a 5 star they should learn what customer service is.

3rd stay in this magnificent establishment, clean and spacious room, large well maintained pools. The only point to highlight is the gym, no equipment and leave to abandon..  special mention to Ali and Olfa at the reception

name: Alhambra Thalasso Hotel
description: Inspired by the famous Alhambra Palace in Granada, and evoking memories of a Moorish and Andalusian era, the elegant and superbly designed Alhambra Thalasso Hotel 5*, member of the prestigious chain Warwick International Hotels, ideally located in the resort of Yasmine Hammamet, is an architectural masterpiece in its own right.Read more
property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

reviews.review_text: Very pleasant spacious room and especially a big thank you to the fram team for their responsiveness and kindness. At the reception Leila is charming and professional at the top really, not forgetting all the hotel staff. Very nice experience to renew

reviews.review_title: Good stay but poorly maintained hotel
reviews.review_text: Good stay overall but does not deserve at all its 5 stars hotel aging especially for the rooms carpeted corridors etc, see obsolete for the thalasso part too bad because the team is great! Tonight the director the salesman or the people who performed the care.   There was also Myriam for the henna so nice and beautiful gifted what she did to us with my friend. Thanks again!   Catering was good homemade just it lacked fruit at that time.   All the staff was friendly and welcoming especially the friendly entertainment team not insistent and invested.  Special mention for Adel at the pool too kind and attentive with everyone anticipated every need really top!   Thank you for the stay which was still good but a little refreshment would improve the feeling

A big thank you to the entire Fram animation team as well as the center manager. Team at the top, always smiling and good mood. Various and varied activities on the programme. They're amazing. Little nod to the very welcoming hotel staff I recommend this hotel club😎

A memorable personal stay with little care we feast in the restaurant there is choice the rooms are superb and thanks to the team Fram mimi Mario pikachu   They made the amazing stay always available and smiling I highly recommend this beautiful beachfront hotel
Hotel friendly  Very clean room  Friendly and warm atmosphere with a lovely team of animators and a special affinity with willy and pikachu  The main buffet is quite correct and the staff is helpful.

First time in Tunisia and very satisfied with the setting, hotel and services offered. From the reception to the restaurant or shop staff without forgetting the animators always to the little care always a nice word by the way, excellent stay I recommend 100%

Great hotel with a good entertainment team (rio mario willy pikachu mimi....) bar very nice authentic restaurant with beautiful discoveries and waiters with great care. Welcoming hotel with leila and the rest of the reception team who will be caring for you. The thalasso on top to relax well. Great stay at this hotel.

A pleasant hotel to stay both for its setting and for the entertainment team.  A team with little care for us, helpful staff, always welcoming with good advice and lots of smiles  An animation team at the top, thank you to all the animation team for their welcome, their good mood, the various activities and evenings offered. A top team with lots of energy, guaranteed laughter  The thalasso was really happy for my spouse and I, a real moment of relaxation  A big thank you for his quality holidays

reviews.review_title: First stay in Tunisia in the Alhambra
reviews.review_text: Top Alhambra thank you to all the team ultra pleasant, first stay in Tunisia to discover the country.  The animation team is at the top thank you for these good times  I discovered the Tunisian dishes also really good there is everything you need at the buffet, the service is very good also.  There is everything you need in this hotel to have a great time.

Great team, beautiful and clean hotel, superb corner! The welcome is very good, the buffet has lots of choice and quality,  with local or traditional. Animations are great. I recommend, everyone is friendly, friendly and with little care! 🤩🤩🤩

Great relaxing stay. The thalasso center has perfectly met our expectations, the treatments are carried out by a team of real professionals. Excellent cuisine and no complaints about the different services. The hotel deserves to be renovated but the comfort is there. Choukrane

First stay with FRAM, pleasantly surprised, everything went very well! The animation team is very present and friendly (thanks to Rio, Pikatchu and Willy).  The hotel, certainly a little aging, is very nice. Our sea view room was spacious. The buffet meals were good. A small downside on desserts that were not up to par and very repetitive. Too bad not to put oriental pastry..   The staff of the hotel (reception, dining room, swimming pool) is school and pleasant.  Small black dot, for my part, on cocktails that are made by machine and served in plastic glasses. I didn't find them good.  I will be back with my mom with pleasure!

reviews.review_title: Hotel of size and human warmth
reviews.review_text: Departed for our honeymoon all the staff was at our care. A week of complete relaxation with teams as much entertainment ( pikachu , Mimi, Willy and the dj😍), as catering , from, welcome (a special mention to Taha 💐), swimming pool, thalasso ( ALL L: TEAM) really adorable! We loved our week! Thank you 👌🙏 we did not make any excursions on site and took full advantage of the thalasso so no opinion on the excursions ☺️

Old but beautiful hotel, very nice staff, animator at the top it raises a little the week.   Poor catering always the same, I have never experienced this.  Bath too high.  Little choice, always serve the same strawberries cupcake,   Purée fries rice brief tjs few choices for children.  No slide.the dirty beach we went there once horrible. False advertising however it is 4 times in Tunisia but the .....

Currently on holiday at Alhambra hotel. I had emailed to ask for a pool view room but we weren’t allocated one. We have a large room though but no balcony which is a bit disappointing. The room is clean, the beds are comfy but it’s basic. Air conditioning isn’t working until June !  Food- there’s a good selection of food available at breakfast, lunch and dinner but no snacks available in between. It would be nice to see the pool bar open for drinks and snacks.  Entertainment- it’s a small animation team who are all friendly and provide activities all day and in the evening. A special shout out to Pikachu and Willy who made our holiday really special. We loved the aqua gym in the morning and their friendliness and enthusiasm.  Staff-Also a special shout to Adel who always found us a sun bed and looked after us bringing towels, pillows, tables, cushions etc. All the staff were super friendly in the hotel, they remembered our names and welcomed us every time they saw us.   We walked to the beach one day but nothing was open and it was dirty and uncared for with no staff and no sign that it had been open at all.   The staff really made this a special holiday for us. Get involved in activities and enjoy all the hotel has to offer.   Pikachu, Willy and Adel you were amazing and we’d return just to see you!!!! 🤩🤩🤩

Very nice hotel. Staff and the animation team are lovely and funny. Drinks are delicious and the food is very good. Reception is very accommodating and willing to help with anything. Lots of good activities to do and nice shops with friendly people. Animation team are very enthusiastic and make every day funny. Would recommend to everyone.

Very nice place very nice hotel equips great food services very friendly helpful always smiling the team of awesome fram animation did not change anything very good animation always smiling nice people meet during our trip regarding the cleaning of the rooms is not terrible a little better do I think.we will come back to it hesitation.

Very nice hotel😍 very welcome😍, the animation team with fram at the top with pikatu, Mario , Willy, Rio, Mimi 😍😍👌👌👌👌. Excellent food😍👌👌👌👌. Disappointed with the cleaning of the rooms 😩😩😩.  Great location close to the city and the beach. Taxi available at any time of day

An animation team at the top I feasted with pikachu Willy mario mago mimi and chef rio they set the mood and are there to help us integrate without counting on the bartenders who are at the top and also Adèl the lifeguard who is always there for us and also I do not forget the reception who react well to all what we ask without forgetting also the housekeeper and the people who maintain the hotel big kisses to all❤️🧡🥰

name: Thalassa Sousse Resort & Aquapark
description: Boasting an unbeatable situation on a golden sandy beach along the Mediterranean Sea, just a few steps from the vibrant city of Sousse, this luxurious hotel offers the perfect choice for holidaymakers eager to explore something out of the ordinary and spice up their sun holidays with a range of outstanding services. Close to El Kantaoui Marina and just a 30-minute drive from the Monastir International Aiport, the comfortable rooms are spread over 3 floors. Those travellers wishing to enjoy full privacy may prefer the comfortable bungalows overlooking the pools or the beach and providing its own terrace. Guests staying at this establishment may find a wide range of dining options including international cuisine, Tunisian specialities and different bars offering the best place to share moments with the family or friends. The magnificent water park offers the young ones the best place to have a great time.Read more
property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

reviews.review_text: I like Italian restaurant,waitress was so good name is Firas. He is excellent. Also in reception name is Islam booking for the restaurant. She is a lovely girl. She is helpful. Pool and water park perfect, clean area. All state very helpful. Safe holtel.  The itertiment group is very good.  Foods for kids is not good, cheese for pizza wasn't good, chicken nuggets some days, some food like pasta tomato souse for kids was hot.  Tissue and ligut soup for the hand was it was not in the room. Also for some parents has kids who need hot water in the room is was not electric kettle.

Great time here animation team don’t stop working to keep you all entertained. Rooms are ok, food is the same but what you expect for a cheap holiday in the sun.  Lots of lifeguards to keep kids safe. Has own beach so you don’t need to leave.  ❤️❤️❤️

name: Hotel Meninx Djerba
description: Looking for a place to stay in Midoun? Then look no further than Hotel Meninx, a charming resort that brings the best of Midoun to your doorstep.Rooms at Hotel Meninx provide air conditioning, and guests can stay connected with free internet access.In addition, while staying at Hotel Meninx guests have access to a concierge. You can also enjoy a pool and an on-site restaurant. Need a place to park? Free parking is available at Hotel Meninx.Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Phare de Taguermess (Lighthouse) (2.4 mi) and Jama Fadloud (Mosque) (2.8 mi), guests of Hotel Meninx can easily experience some of Midoun's most well known attractions.While in Midoun be sure to experience nearby Asian restaurants such as Voyages En Asie.Looking to explore? Then look no further than Krokodilfarm Animalia, which is a popular Midoun park – and it is conveniently located a short distance from the resort.We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Hotel Meninx as you experience everything Midoun has to offer.Read more

reviews.review_title: BEWARE Hotel Meninx, Djerba , Tunisia CLOSED
reviews.review_text: BEWARE  Hotel Meninx Djerba, Tunisa,was closed last week 14-21 Jan.  We were booked for it through Loveholidays and were not informed of it by either Loveholidays or the hotel.  Friends and I were shocked and panicked when we arrived late evening. We didn't know where to go or who to contact.  Loveholidays had an emergency phone number but it was useless as I only bought a data sim and couldn't make calls.   Thanks to our wonderful driver from the local taxi firm KBCar, who found out we were transferred to another hotel nearby. He then took us there free of charge.   So if you are booked for it is the next few weeks double check before you leave for your trip that it has reopened. Didn't want to give any stars but had to give one in order to post this review.

description: Decorated in a traditional Djerbian style, the Seabel Aladin Djerba is a wonderful holiday destination both inside and out. name: Hotel La Residence Hammamet
description: The hotel Residence Hammamet is situated in city center of Hammamet and within only 100m from a private beach of fine sand, hotel is built on arabo Moresque style, with a patio of garden decorated with flowers in the middle of the main building. The hotel as a total surface 3500m² and 11.000M² covered and offer a capacity of 174 studios (152 identical with a kitchen and 22 without), each studios has private bathroom and kitchenette (refrigerator, cooking equipment and dining area). All the studios have a capacity from 01 to 04 persons (02 twin beds and 02 sofa beds) with a total surface of 35m²/studio. From your arrival, you will be welcomed by a staff who will indulge to direct you to one of 174 rooms (restarted on 3 floors) with all that they offer in comfort and in conveniences.Read more

reviews.review_text: A particularly welcoming hotel.Location that allows you to fully enjoy the beauty of the city, to participate in its life. Ideal for long walks. Very large rooms, satellite TV and wifi very satisfactory. It also has a beautiful garden and a large penthouse equipped for relaxing in the sun with swimming pool. Very friendly, kind and efficient staff. Rich breakfast. Repetitive dinner but really cheap.

Hotel not far from the sea and the medina.  Very welcoming staff, attentive and very responsive when needed. Stayed 5 days well spent. Everyone was very nice, but special mention for Houcine ❤️ Bashir and Sami.  I recommend!

My stay at the Residence Hammamet was very pleasant.  The location is great, the rooms are clean and the staff adorable, Samy, Me Leïla and Naima.  Special mention for fluffy pillows.  I recommend this hotel.

A good hotel, with very nice renovated room, a suitable location to discover hammamet and 5 minutes from the beach , kind and professional staff. The hotel has good space to rest. The hotel that seemed small at first impression would hide large spaces

Great location 10 minutes walk from the medina and beach. Numerous food points Possibility parking in front. Warm welcome.   We were 2 couples we were upgraded.  Nice big room. Modern toilets very clean. The staff welcome restaurant very pleasant and professional. Swimming pool 3rd floor with sea view.

Oh dear!  Cheap for a reason. No maintenance - really run down in all areas.  Dingy.  Smokey.  Health hazard all areas. Positives - excellent location overlooking harbour.  Nice courtyard gardens. You must avoid at all costs. Staying here will make your skin crawl.

We spent 5 days in this hotel in October 2024. The rooms are simple, large and comfortable. The bathroom is also nice although the plumbing can be improved. Everything is clean and maintained every day. The staff is very friendly. We took full board. The buffet may be a little repetitive but they are attentive and responsive. The bar and outside are nice with entertainment some evenings. The pool is not heated so water too cold despite the good temperatures in October. We therefore preferred the beach of the hotel. There again pleasant staff and little care. In the lobby of the hotel 2 people offer excursions. We must not stop at the typical and somewhat insistent sales methods. They are finally very friendly and did not hesitate to help us when we encountered a problem with transport to the airport, without expecting anything in return. We did the camel tour and it was perfect! The guide is very interesting, speaks several languages. Pleasant walk with tasting and entertainment at the end.

reviews.review_title: Stay in Hammamet at the residence
reviews.review_text: This hotel was very good, well placed also to visit everything.  I have the pool, the private apartment incredible space and functionality.  I recommend this hotel value for money and the decoration the warm atmosphere.The comfort.

We stopped at the Hammamet Residence, for 2 nights. We were very well received with a small lemonade. The staff is attentive and very friendly! As for the environment, the hotel is authentic. The room is unpretentious: charming and comfortable. The bathrooms are clean and very functional, really nothing to say! I recommend this hotel if you are looking for authenticity. We did not taste the restoration. The location is ideal , 2 steps from the city center and all amenities. I recommend

I booked one night in this hotel. Upon arrival, met with a wonderful receptionist Sami who offered me welcome drink and a place of Tunisian dessert. He upgraded my room to a suite for free. Well, the room or now the suite is so nice and big. A/C is not working. Went down to the reception and asked to fix the A/C and got the answer that it’s not working in the whole property for maintenance. Went outside to buy a bottle of water because I lack it in the room. Tried one hour to struggle with the weather and later on, decided to change the hotel. Again went down asking Sami to find me any solution or I have to leave with bad feelings. Such a gentleman, he upgraded me again to a bungalow, means additional kitchen and balcony. Wow, at last I can open the room door and the balcony door so as to get better.  Breakfast is so simple. Location is great, few minutes from the beach.  What I like in there is the great staff and the location of the hotel. Please you have to inform your customers about any maintenance in advance but don’t let them be in.

Very nice hotel despite being a bit  dated. Very large and spacious room. Dehor more than acceptable.  Kitchen and bathroom to be restored.  Friendly staff.  Good location, close to downtown  Price in the norm.  Presence of the swimming pool and a bar.

reviews.review_title: Great location very kind and helpful staff
reviews.review_text: Structure dated but comfortable. Right downtown. Recommended superior rooms as the others are quite old as well as common areas. Very kind and helpful staff (Laila at reception, Khadija femme de ménage, Brahim the maintainer..,). An unpretentious hotel that allows a stay in a family environment. Lost a clutch in the evening in the pool that was found by cleaning women and delivered to the reception complete with everything. Catering definitely insufficient but in short with 30 euros a day you have what you pay.: I personally will return,,,

We were well received. The service is really good and we liked the Things to do at the Pension! I sincerely recommend this Pension. Regarding the food , I was really surprised at the common sense because it is really very good! The rooms are super clean!

Everything is nickel excursion ( horse quad camel ) and Pension . Everything is fine supervising the staff at the top! I would recommend to any person this Pension in 60 av Habib bourguiba. Location 50 m from the beach. Swimming pool on you with sea view. Pension Hammamet the residence.

reviews.review_title: Inn where you feel the guest is KING
reviews.review_text: Pension where the relational aspect is very present: welcome, smile, availability.... The staff is always smiling and ready to help Everything is perfect, rooms, catering, swimming pool, private beach, entertainment... Pension that largely deserves a 4th star. Congratulations to all and thank you for your hospitality and professionalism, something that is more found in some hotels in Tunisia Good continuation.

One of the best holidays we have been on as a family, the facilities of the hotel were amazing and the staff couldn’t do enough for us. The food was great and there was always activities to do throughout the day and entertainment on most nights. The hotel have their own animation team who are all lovely and try and get all the guests involved in what they are doing.  The room was cleaned daily and fresh towels, toilet roll ect. Too.

name: Radisson Blu Resort & Thalasso, Hammamet
description: The Radisson Blu Resort & Thalasso offers a peaceful retreat by the Mediterranean Sea. Formerly a small fishing town, Hammamet is nicknamed the "garden resort" for its white sand beaches intermingled with citrus trees and olive groves. Our hotel is just 500 meters from the nearest bus stop, making it easy to visit local sites. All 274 rooms and suites provide access to the pool plus modern amenities, such as satellite channels and Free high-speed, wireless Internet.Read more
property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

reviews.review_text: Nice large room.  King bed comfortable; however, the pillows were awful.  Mini fridge, safe, bottle of water in the room.  Beautiful pool and view of the beach.  Buffet breakfast has good choices and an egg station.  Room 224 had a green theme.  Some of the other rooms had a different color scheme.

The hotel lobby and pool areas are quite nice.  Rooms don’t mirror the public areas of the hotel.  Our air conditioning has been on for hours and the room is not cooling down sufficiently and has a stuffy kind of feel. The sleeping pillows on the bed are either supper lumpy or super hard.  The bathroom is extremely tiny, absurdly small.  The counter space in the bathroom is almost non existent. No bath mat supplied so the floor was extremely slippery when getting out of the shower.  There were pubic hairs on the bathroom counter surrounding the bowl sink that sat on that counter. Bedside reading light on one side of the bed doesn’t come on.

reviews.review_title: Quiet hotel to get out of a daily stress!
reviews.review_text: A perfect stay, in a perfect hotel! I wanted to decompress in a stress-free and quiet place.... My goal is achieved!  Evening meal and breakfast very good and with lots of choices   Very nice outdoor and indoor swimming pool   Hard to leave after 10 days of holidays ... The staff so endearing 😍  Thank you very much for this wonderful stay!

reviews.review_title: This is not a 5 star hotel
reviews.review_text: Would not recommend to anyone - one of the worst hotel experiences I've had. Poor service, low quality breakfast, room service refuses to charge to the room, AC broken, cheap and tacky design, not even allowed to bring your own water onto the site.   Watched someone spill cereal outside the breakfast area and walk away - the staff just watched, stood there and carried on talking, no one cleaned it away.  Do not understand the positive reviews, this feels about 20 years outdated and has been given no attention.

reviews.review_title: Annual stay at Radisson blu Hammamet
reviews.review_text: Satisfaction at the end of the stay, welcome by professional and attentive team. To be improved: possibility to obtain an interview with sales manager, reception imposes a request by email. A more flexible approach would be welcome. Flawless catering service thanks to the attentions of the HAMED server and the discreet but very efficient presence of the butler NABIL.  High quality thalassotherapy care by a competent and caring team (thanks to LEILA) We will gladly return

We have been to this hotel many times mainly for the amazing service from the staff and great location.  Nothing too much trouble for reception staff, especially Ruim who was very helpful, efficient and kind  Always something for everyone at the food buffet.
Very nice hotel, located on the beach, in a quiet environment. All staff are very attentive

Today we had a great day at the Radisson Spa  Wonderful therapeutic massage and plantar reflexology on the recommendations of the charming receptionist Wissem.  Very welcome Beautiful Hamman. To do without hesitation!

Very nice hotel, clean and well located. Welcoming staff, comfortable room, delicious breakfast. Stay relaxing and faultless. I highly recommend this property! Beautiful view from the room! That’s what struck me the most.

reviews.review_title: Stunning hotel in a paradise location.
reviews.review_text: This is our third visit to this amazing hotel; each time during February half-term in the UK.  There is nothing we can fault.  It is in a stunning location, lovely breakfast and friendly staff.  We were upgraded to a suite which was incredible. The breakfast buffet will suit everyone's tastes.

I have just completed a 15-day cure at the Thalasso Radisson Blu Center in Hammamet and am totally delighted with it.  All the staff and the Director in mind Mr. Faisal Ouellani, listened to my wishes, and perfectly met my expectations.  The quality of the hydro treatments (showers, Hammam, pre-sotherapy, etc...) as well as the many massages very varied, were provided to me by attentive and qualified staff. Many thanks for alleviating my back pain, and especially to Mrs. Amira. I highly recommend this establishment for thalasso treatments and relaxation.

Very good stay at Radisson blue hotel, great location.  The staff is very friendly and considerate in all services (reception, bars, dining room).   The room with sea view, very clean with a little personal touch from the maid. Many thanks to Amira (Amina).   I enjoyed the Thalasso (1st goal of my trip), equipment, pools, spas and fitness.  The staff is very professional, very kind and considerate.  Thank you all. Monique and Yves Jotterand

Clean and comfortable room and great sea views, and a big thank you for the housekeeper, kind and responsive reception especially Iheb and Rym. Breakfast might be a little better if not good service at the waiters level at the restaurant.

reviews.review_title: Not recommended for family with kids
reviews.review_text: The hotel is quite empty during February holidays, the family rooms are perfect, also the food, but the kids' club is closed, No animation, Wifi is very poor, and the cellular network is bad (ooredoo),  There is nothing to do except eating and swimming! I don't recommend if you have kids.

reviews.review_title: A remarkable long stay in sublime surroundings
reviews.review_text: I have stayed in this beautiful Hotel since a good time considering my professional occupations in the region , I was able to invite my little family from Morocco during the holiday spent at the end of the year here in Radisson , frankly we had a pleasant stay absolutely fantastic , a warm welcome and friendly and very attentive staff , especially the reception counter , the maids at the head Madame Samiha with her service and extraordinary smile , the restaurant staff all and all without exception at the head Abdessamad , Kamal , the 2 Nabil , Ahmed , Aymen , the 2 women at the buffet dinner and of course the great chef master cook with his presence , smile and professionalism . A big thank you to all the teams for making our stay splendid , I will bring back my family and friends no doubt no hesitation inchaalah , and I would highly recommend this Hotel for those looking for luxury and conform to Hammamet ... Warmly  yahya;)

name: Eden Yasmine Hotel, Meeting & Spa
description: In an arab-andalusian style refreshed with a contemporary mind, Eden Yasmine enchants and allures the visitor both with its laidback air and its quiet atmosphere. True to its name, the hotel is a little timeless paradise, immune to the surrounding tumult. The visitor is thus immersed in a naturally chic and peaceful atmosphere.... Eden Yasmine is located in the heart of the seaside resort of Yasmine Hammamet, close to the Medina, its Casino and the Marina.Read more
property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

reviews.review_title: Golden people from the animation team. Everyone who comes here is going to have a great time. Dikke 10 plus.
reviews.review_text: I'll give the animation team a big A. Because of them we had a super holiday. Friendly and cheerful as a team should be.  We definitely recommend this hotel, especially because of the good care. We are there for the 2nd x in May that certainly says enough.

Thank you for the good conditions. We are satisfied with the hotel and the animators. The food is wonderful.Scooby, he is a crazy animator and smiling all the time, the bar staff is very good too, Mr. Khamys, he has good service, the restaurant is good food, the receptionist Ridha is funny too, but the problem is that there is no bar in the venue of the show.

I'll start with the staff because they were amazing, they paid attention to us, the rooms were clean, the food was great, the pool was clean, there are waiters who serve you all the time, they have a bar that works until late, there is music, billiards, quiz, darts, stretching, table hockey!! Everything you need!!! 2026 we are here again 😘😘😊

Small friendly hotel, close to the Medina and the port. Staff very helpful, nice, smiling. Khmais(mustache waiter) is adorable at the service of the pool and bar. Momo the host is also available and listening. The food is varied and good with typical dishes. Nice and clean swimming pool, deckchairs available. Spacious and clean room with smiling maids. Brief hotel that we recommend where we lounge and sunbathe...😍
Good stay in hammamet we loved our holidays the animators very kind. Welcoming really great time with family. The food is good. Thank you very much for this stay. ❤️💙❤️💙🤲🏿🤲🏿👌👌🙏🙏👍👍🤩🤩🤩😎😎😎😎

We spent 4 days/3 nights with girls. We had a pleasant stay! - The room: clean, fridge, balcony, comfortable bedding, well soundproofed. - Restaurant: all-inclusive formula with unlimited buffet morning and evening. Various meals for all tastes, traditional meals. Everything was very good. Cocktail at will!  Animation: super nice animators, we have a lot of fun. Activities offered during the day and theme evening. -Personal: all the staff is very careful to have a pleasant stay.  - Swimming pool: outdoor pool and heated interior. Lots of deckchairs. - Surroundings: right next to the medina and carthageland In short, we recommend couple, friends, family!!!!

The animation team at the top, we had a good laugh with Scooby. The bar team is smiling (Azzedine welcomed us)  We recommend this hotel, the food is also varied and good for an all inclusive hotel.❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️

Thank you to the animation and reception team for their kindness, very good stay! Buffet meal that varies daily and wide choice, activities offered at the hotel. Indoor and outdoor swimming pool with towel! With friends, family or top couple

Great hotel , nice welcome , entertainment team at the top. Ideal for a couple or family stay with children. The receptionists as well as the housekeepers are very welcoming too.  Recommended this hotel  Various and typical restoration.

Dirty room (bath joints covered with mold), extremely dirty indoor pool! Hammam in breakdown... Poor entertainment, animators a little too familiar, especially with women... In short, a Wish version hotel: from the low end from A to Z. Tunisia, once but not twice. The only positive: the employees, very kind and really brave to work in such conditions.

The hotel is nice but not quite like the photos advertised lol both pools are very good and the staff are amazing all  down to the bar staff to the resturant staff and reception staff. Bar shuts at 12/midnight but they let you stay in there after which is nice. The blue Lagoon cocktail was my favourite and the lovley waiter in the afternoon makes a yummy green one. He used to bring them to our sunbed which I thought was lovley.   Sometimes it was hard to get a sunbed so I dunno how it is in high season. You are also not allowed to reserve beds.   The food is okay but not very hot but the deserts are delightful.  At breakfast they do nice omlettes The resturant manager Ali is soooo lovley and was always so pleased to see us. He's got really got banter.   I tried eating out a couple times as wanted to taste real Tunisian food and that did not disappoint.   This hotel is more catered to family's and couples. So if your a group of friends this might be a bit boring for you. The staff make this hotel luckily. The beds are like concrete and so are the pillows 😢 but the hotel is clean and friendly.   Momo taught us Arabic on the first day and I thought this was really nice.  Do not buy trips from this hotel the guy is a scammer!!!  I payed £12 For a boat trip with pickup and drop off and dinner and a couple from this hotel was on the same boat and payed £50!! When we got back from the trip the rude man from the hotel was then demanding money from us. I called my travel agent and they said don't pay him nothing you already paid. 😂 So I told him to go away but I should of reported him. The camera man is really friendly and makes you feel like a celebrity every night lol I probably wouldn't stay here again but I would defiantly come back to Tunisia as it's got the friendliest people I've ever met.  💕

I spent a good week in this hotel, the animation team and the staff are very nice,  Special signing to the momo animator and the roberto manager  The food is excellent and very varied 🏝️🇹🇳  The place is ideally located

A big + for the animation team, thanks to "cinderella(fabio) and mommy(mamadou)'s son"😁. The staff at the front desk is great and really helpful👍. The Spa is great, the treatments great👍. The pool is very nice and the rooms are nice.  From room 261 😉(mom, 35/wife, and sister-in-law 😉)

Very nice vacancy I loved it , amazing animation team specially Momo and Ahmed skoubi Roberto hiba , we will back soon , clean room nice pool good food 😁😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😄😁 anhhhhhhhhhhh

reviews.review_title: Lovely 4 star all-inclusive hotel v friendly staff
reviews.review_text: This hotel was perfect for a 4 day break. The staff are really friendly. Idriz in the shisha bar was lovely. The food was varied and there was lots of local food to try. The swimming pool is massive and beautiful. Can really recommend this hotel.

reviews.review_title: The city is very pretty with many activities vary
reviews.review_text: Good animation, the staff and animators are very friendly, the room and clean and clean every day what is nice, the site is very nice and the pool very large.The beach is next to the hotel which is very convenient for walking

name: Ulysse Djerba Thalasso & Spa
description: Ulysse Djerba Thalasso & Spa is located alongside a beautiful white sandy beach and set amidst gardens and palm trees on the beautiful island of Djerba. This hotel is specially dedicated to all travelers categories :couples,families and friends. Fine dining is guaranteed in the different à la carte restaurants. Also the main buffet restaurant will win your heart and taste with its international cuisine.Read more
property_amenities: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

reviews.review_text: Nice hotel, very comfortable room and bedding.clean nickel.good food, pastries cakes very good. Thalasso incredible a big thank you to all and especially to Mohamed who gave me a divine massage 🥰 Thank you

Excellent at all levels Very decent rooms, quiet (rare in most of the 5-star hotels in the region! Perfect services, close to the pool and beach Menus for all tastes It was our 3rd stay in Djerba, by far the best Thank you.

Thanks to all the staff  room with sea view, large, nice, ladies cleaning very nice Thank you  Meals we eat very well Thank you to the chefs and kitchen staff  , fish, vegetables, raw vegetables, meat etc...vennoiserie with fresh top of good fresh fruit  I like less their desserts, I like those of the Tunisian evening  fresh orange juice in the morning a plus  beach very well  We spent two weeks great.  We'll come back.  Thanks to the hotel team without forgetting the direction soon

Thank you to the entire hotel team. Third time we stayed at this hotel. Impeccable rooms. Top staff. Very nice animation team. Thank you all, not forgetting Osama our favorite photographer always so kind! We will be back next year  Corinne GERELLI , Philippe VAVASSORI

We had a great week. Access to the beach, beautiful swimming pool, beautiful thalassotherapy center and spa Kind staff, welcoming and smiling. The hotel is very quiet. The clean room. At the restaurant, lots of choices. Tunisian specialities are a treat. We will return without hesitation.

Great stay in this establishment that deserves all its stars. Excellent welcome, great staff, comfortable rooms, tasty food and impeccable facilities. Superb setting with sea views. An experience to renew very soon

reviews.review_title: Great stay at Ulysee. Gladly again;)
reviews.review_text: Great hotel with small shortcomings.   First of all, it has to be mentioned that it is an all-inclusive hotel and meets the Tunisian standard. And that's exactly what it did. The arrival was super organized with welcome drink, the rooms clean and were freshened up every day. The non-alcoholic minibar was also always filled. All staff were friendly and accommodating. The food was varied, as I said it is an AI hotel where there is everything every day and you can eat something different every day. The selection of AI drinks was really good, you know that differently. You should calculate the price m you pay doet times down to the day. That was 100 euros per day with 3 x food, drinks have end and snacks in between. Not counting the flight and transfer.  Nevertheless, I would have a few reviews: • in the spa area there was no price list, so I have to assume that the prices vary • it would be nice if you could pay by card at the reception, as at the beginning of the holiday a tourist tax is required, which you would like to pay by card

reviews.review_title: Panorama and calm at the rendezvous
reviews.review_text: Hotel is not at the level of a five-star due to poor catering (among other industrial pastry)  On the other hand room, decoration and top service. Private beach nearby (mattress booked in the morning for the day is problematic) and quality pool.

reviews.review_title: If the courts are ready tp play on, we will come back
reviews.review_text: Room: nice, good space and proper (we chose a Deluxe room) Food: very good, various, delicious meals, we appreciated the fresh juices at breakfast Servers: symphatic and they give you the feeling to care and to look after your needs, special thanks to the friendlyness and effectiv services of Jamle and Nasser in the main restaurant. Reception: emphaptic and ready to help - thanks Services: bar's, restaurants and coffe space nice, decorated with, all spaces are clean, little beach Sports: we came to play tennis, but the 4 courts are in a pitiable state. You cann't play on this ground ("potholes" and cavities)

A hotel offering a friendly setting. Highlights are the welcoming and smiling staff at the reception, in the restaurant, in the cafés or elsewhere. It is one of the few hotels in Djerba where the staff do not differentiate between guests according to their nationality, which I particularly appreciated. The restaurant is good, offering a varied choice for all tastes. The only negative point: the room, which has neither headboard nor bedside tables.

Very welcoming and clean.  The staff is at your disposal.  The rooms are spacious enough and the bedding is good.  I was on the ground floor, so I had an outdoor terrace that led to an open pool with a beautiful pool. Some rooms have direct access to the pool via a ladder on the terrace.  The meals are very varied and there is something for everyone.  The private beach is also very nice  Frankly everything is top

When I see some reviews, advising to avoid or flee the hotel, I think that guests are derogatory in their remarks to qualify this property. They claim that it’s not a 5-star, that’s probably true by some standards we have here, but I’m surprised, if not annoyed, that people who pay a little over a thousand euros a week for two, submit such negative reviews.  A “true 5 star” is 500€ a night without side.  If you want breakfast, lunch and dinner, you will have to pay extra.  Here, everything is included, 3 meals a day, real squeezed orange juice for breakfast, pastries etc.  The majority of staff are courteous, hardworking and dedicated.  The professional reception, the whole team of animators present, without being invasive, and with a rare sympathy. This hotel with its feet in the water and a beautiful beach is our happiness, we who come here for the 4th time, the welcome is always marked and friendly. The rooms are spacious, made every day. The food offers a variety of dishes that can satisfy everyone. For the rest, we  this establishment next June. What else! Didier G.

Superb hotel, clean and spacious rooms with exceptional staff and great entertainment team. The buffet is diverse and varied It is ideally located facing the sea and a few minutes by taxi from the city. Wide choice of activities on site.

In itself the hotel is quite correct very far from a 5 stars attention it is local standards so far below what you can imagine the maintenance is correct it is the staff that must change at the reception especially the maids on the other hand very correct and do their job well. But then the Thalasso especially the reception agent a disaster is very far from the standards of a SPA or a Thalasso the staff is poorly qualified lz equipment aging in short no interest except massages which overall are very well but similar everything depends on the person who will take care of you. A place that seems totally blocked in the 80’s in short if you are not too demanding ... or you like ruined holidays then this is the place for you otherwise run away and especially do not book with Ovoyage

Very clean and well maintained hotel, spacious room and very large firm bed (2m/2m) bathroom with towels changed daily and bed redone daily. Many staff in this hotel, they are adorable and very brave because they work a lot. The buffets (breakfast/lunch and dinner) are exceptional, quality and very varied bravo to all the teams in the kitchen we feasted every day. Thanks also to the teams of 2 bars and a cuckoo from France to Mohammed who will celebrate his birthday on Sunday. Very nice complex in general and beautiful swimming pools, secure hotel and guards at each corner with entrance control. The biggest part of this hotel is the entertainment: the animators are uninteresting and soft of the knee and I know what I'm talking about having done animation myself in campsites clubs and holiday villages for 8 years. Animations non-existent and uninteresting like the animators. Who also do their rehearsals around the pool and repeat the same music 5 times before they know how to chain 3 steps. In short, no interest in the animation division  Everything else was super thank you to him.

Bonjour! This was a nice, clean and well kept hotel with excellent, welcoming staff throughout. 99.99% of the tourists are French, and the wife and I was the other 0.01%. However, all the staff and most French spoke good English, so no problems at all. We even learnt a little French too. There's was a bit of renovation going on outside but nothing to spoil our stay.  A very good selection of international buffet food on offer for breakfast, lunch and evening meal, so no complaints there. As in most hotels you had to book the a-la-carte restaurant and it was pre-order traditional Tunisian dishes, which we enjoyed very much. The all-inclusive drinks selection was more than satisfactory too.  There is plenty of nice quite areas to sunbath, if you prefer, as the main pool has the usual boom-boom music playing most of the day.  The evening entertainment was a bit of a let down (as there wasn't much, if any at all) but that didn't bother us with only being there for 3 nights. However, I'm sure that will change in high season. Day and night, I believe young children would probably get very bored, very quickly here, although, again, this could change in high season.  Djerba centre/souks (only £4ew in taxi) was nice but as you'd expect, lots of bazaars selling the same stuff, every owner wanting you to look around their shop, we did buy a few things but didn't stay long . There was not much going on at the Marina either.   All-in-all a pleasant and enjoyable stay, but 3 nights/4 days was definitely enough for us as there's not much to do inside or outside of the hotel, apart from walk on the beach.

Superb arrival at the hotel, room with beautiful sea view, very welcoming staff. The buffet is good and varied. The animators are always at our disposal and invested so that we have a pleasant stay. Most interestingly, the thalasso area with a wide choice of very pleasant treatments. I recommend this hotel for a couple holiday!!

A very pleasant stay in Djerba. A very warm welcome to the hotel, the catering staff cared for, Thank you Jamel for the nicely laid table with flowers, A beautiful setting.  Memorable discoveries of Tunisia, Midoun, Tataouine, Cheninie... The hotel is very good. Between the indoor heated pool and the outdoor pool, everyone can find themselves there

We had a wonderful stay my wife enchanted with thalassotherapy very professional and personal kind,  Nice beach, everything rolls they make bcp effort, quality ratio price very well, there are grumpy tjrs I would like to see how they live at home!!!! Excellent promotions services tjrs responded to our requests good organization. The only downside the overpriced tourist tax is the state that sets the price but not the establishment. We recommend this property

we arrived at the end of the morning, for a provision of our room at 4pm, lamentable welcome, dirty corridors etc... however the thalasso is quite acceptable, the restaurant staff is very friendly, pity,!

name: Mehari Hammamet

reviews.review_title: A place where the soul rests and the heart rests
reviews.review_text: After a long separation from Tunisia, she finally flew back to this hospitable country! She was resting in May 2025, when the season was just gaining momentum. Despite this, the hotel was fully prepared for the reception: everything is clean, well maintained, everything works like clockwork. The hotel is located near the airport, I had the shortest transfer in my life - 3 minutes. This is particularly true for families with children. I had an early run, had no problem solving it.  Rooms are clean, spacious. Towels and linen are new. The hotel's food is fine, thanks to the chef. Everything was delicious, the choice of dishes is sufficient. Desserts, fruit, wine - all fresh and beautiful quality. The grounds are not small, there is no feeling of pounding. The beach strip is quite wide, clean, with virtually no algae. The entrance to the sea is smooth, it is safe to drive with small children and those who are not confident on the water. The sunbeds, the umbrellas, they were all there. Internet is fast and stable throughout the hotel except the beach. It's possible to work remotely for whoever is relevant. I would like to pay special tribute to the work of all hotel staff. Everyone works quickly and smoothly, I'm left with the feeling of being in a big, friendly family. The hotel has a massage parlour with various programmes. Salon owner Mehdi (doctor and part-time polyglot) will help to tailor the course to everyone's needs. A professional massage just brought me back to life! Highly recommended! The location is excellent - near the metro station, you can quickly get to both Sousse and Monastir. You can walk around these cities, organize a shopping or excursion program yourself. In summary: the price/quality ratio of the hotel is excellent, I will recommend to my friends and acquaintances. The hotel wishes success and prosperity for many years! Thank you for your wonderful holiday!

Choosing with a friend a country for a holiday and the tour operator offered Tunisia. Not long thinking, bought the vouchers because the hotel discounted. Secondly, of the pros - the hotel's proximity to the airport (first brought, last taken!), near the subway station, the white sand beach, the sea is relatively clean and not deep, there is no seaweed and jellyfish, delicious food in the restaurant (fish every day), wine of good quality, separately prepare pizza and pancakes, polite waiters and always interested in health chefs! Animators - respect 👍🏻 Especially remembered handsome Sophen, who did not obsessively suggest anything to do, such as yoga or stretching, which we were happy to do)) Russian is not spoken much, but one feels that we are missed and the locals are very much waiting for our camback 🤩 Also in the hotel opened a massage parlor, whose owner Dr. Osteopath Mehdi, who worked for a long time in St. Petersburg (!) and speaks fluent Russian. reviews.review_title: Hard not to fall in love with Tunisia 💛
reviews.review_text: I'm in a hotel with a family with two kids. The Russians haven't visited Tunisia en masse in a long time and we are missed frankly (Arabs ask in Sousse and Monastir when we will return). Witnessed the start of the season.  The first thing that matters is that the staff really makes the rest better. I've been to Egypt many times, never seen that. To eat: the choice is small but everything is very, very delicious, satisfied, chef well done. Music: God forbid the animator who has such beautiful taste, we get high on this accompaniment. Beach: the best sand in the entire Mediterranean - I confirm. On the beach is safe for any age - very smooth entrance. Ten minutes from the hotel is not only the airport but also the ground subway: for 30 rubles you can drive to Sousse and Monastir, a beautiful plus Tunisia. Bar pile: wine from bottles is great, beer and spill and bottles - delicious. Pizza and pancakes are amazing. The children's slides have also come. The wi fi is chic like home in Russia: fast and stable, incredibly catching in the room and kids playing network games. The hotel is as old as anything in Tunisia, but beautiful, atmospheric. Although the Dessole chain has long since left Tunisia, the positive plume remains, we have nothing to pick on for the amount paid at the start of the season. Satisfied and would return again. The hotel easily changes dollars into dinars. Nouvelair is a great carrier, Grand is a great TO. Prosperity, love for Tunisia. I'll be there in a year, even in Bella Vista if I can. I recommend Tunisia, if the price is not excessive. Because the Turks and the Egyptians have already overstated it. Ah yes cons: beach towels for 10 bucks (inadmissible :)) and tourist tax, we charged 7,000p for two.  Thank you Bella Vista, thank you Tunisia!

We was extremely happy with all attraction. All meals were very tasty and every day you could eat something different. Every evening they also organized discos in the rhythm of different music. There is also a man on the hotel premises who organizes various attractions outside the hotel, such as: a pirate ship cruise, camel riding and many others. The entire hotel team was very polite and helped us every time we had any questions.
