reviews.review_title: A big disappointment for a 4 star hotel
reviews.review_text: Our stay at Hotel Le Ksar was very disappointing, despite a pleasant setting. Several points have greatly displeased us, to the point of questioning the 4 star rating of the property.  Catastrophic animation  Animation is non-existent and soulless. The animation team, apart from one or two people, is totally lacking in motivation and enthusiasm. The activities of the day are almost nil, except for a game of pétanque, and the evenings are of absolute sadness. The facilitators themselves seem to be uninterested, which makes no one want to participate at all. For a hotel in this category, this is unacceptable.  Very limited cleanliness despite a dedicated employee  As soon as we arrived, we were shocked by the state of the room, far from the expected standard. The cleanliness was poor, and this problem did not get better during the stay. However, we found that the maid was doing her best. She was overworked and had too little time to ensure effective cleaning. It is therefore not a lack of professionalism on his part, but a big problem of organization and resources.  A very average, even misleading All-Inclusive  The All-Inclusive service is very disappointing, especially in terms of drinks.  Alcoholic beverages appear to be cut with water, making them tasteless.  Difficulty finding glasses and cutlery repeatedly, which forces you to search or wait.  Low quality and choice for a hotel in this category.  Lack of general organisation  Recurrent problem with pool towels: often broken, forcing holidaymakers to wait or do without.  Often outdated staff: Some employees are helpful and do their best, but they are clearly understaffed.  Conclusion: a hotel to avoid  We already stayed in 3 star hotels in Djerba that were much better than Le Ksar. Between non-existent animation, insufficient cleanliness, very average All-Inclusive and a glaring lack of organization, we definitely do not recommend this property. It is far from the level expected for a 4 star.

Service at the shabby restaurant. It is up to us to find the cutlery and glasses, the tables are never laid. No bottle of water in the restaurant or in the rooms, we have to fill a decanter with water and find an empty bottle and fill it If you wish to have some in the room. The staff is not very welcoming, complicated to have a smile, except the housekeeping staff, it really feels like others are suffering their day. The cleaning of the rooms is very succinct, claim toilet paper, shower gel is not accessible. All inclusive is very limited to soft drinks, and beer. Coke whisky pays as does gin. The animation team is totally non-existent, no animation during the day, except to come to you to ask you when you arrived and when you leave, that's all! We have been coming to Djerba for ten years twice a year. This is the first and last time we will stay in this hotel which is far from deserving of these four stars.  We don't know if there are any officials in this structure, but if they exist it's time to set the bar straight, you're definitely not up to the other establishments.

reviews.review_title: relaxation in the sun of Djerba
reviews.review_text: Great stay in Djerba! Clean hotel, friendly staff, beautiful pool and direct access to the beach. Various cuisine. Perfect for relaxing in the sun. I highly recommend! The sea is beautiful, turquoise water and sandy beach right next to the hotel. A real paradise to relax and swim every day.

reviews.review_title: Great hotel, staff and animation team
reviews.review_text: Just back from a weeks stay with a friend, hotel was lovely, peaceful and quiet. Rooms where clean and cleaned everyday. Pools where great and also kept very clean. Jimmy and his animation team where great, approachable and very good keeping the entertainment going. Bar staff and pool staff where very accommodating and friendly. Would recommend this hotel for a quiet, relaxing holiday.

Excellent hotel. Animation team very entertaining. People very friendly and kind. Rooms nice and clean. Close to beach and shops. Beautiful marina ❤️👌bar staff friendly. All staff approachable and always happy to help 😁 great swimming pools and sea swim pool which is unreal. Sunshine is fantastic.

Fabulous holiday .. The animation team were brilliant .. especially Amine , Mario and Ghana and Jimmy xx will be back xxxx The restaraunt staff were attentive and the food was fresh and delicious . The hotel was relaxing and we will definitely be back xxx

reviews.review_title: It was a very good experience at the hotel with the host Amin Ben maouia and I will be blind in August. The hotel
reviews.review_text: I really liked the hotel and a special thank you to the tourist animator Mohamed Amin Ben Mouia for his interest in me and the welcome. The animation was really excellent. Everything was fine The room and food were good and people were respectful in customer service and had good behavior.

Amine, Mario & Ghada from the animation team are lovely! Lots of fun and make all visitors feel welcome! water aerobics was always fun in the morning and a great way to start the day! Khaled is the best lifeguard. He always went above and beyond to look after us. Thank you for being so lovely!!

I had a lovely time at the hotel thanks to the animation team especially Ghada Amin and Mario. They put on great entertainment each night. Food was nice with a good variation of dishes and desserts. The hotel and bar staff are always friendly and happy to help.

Had the best experience with my friends, the animation team were the best, shout out to Mario & Amine & Ghada who made our experience amazing. Will be back soon! Food was great, and rooms were very clean. The staff were all friendly and helpful

Amazing service all week. Staff were outstanding. In particular Anmine, he was fantastic each day at the poolside. Great conversation & super accommodating. 5 star.   nabil at the bar was also fantastic. Great conversationist & runs the bar unbelievably.   Will be back.

Animators very nice and always ready to set the mood. A big thank you to Amine for her dynamism and kindness Decoration and furniture classes. When there's a problem, it's settled immediately. The restaurant is excellent, the dishes are varied and regularly renewed.

Mario, Amine and Ghada are all adorable. Thanks to them, we had fun, thanks to them!!! The hotel is nice and the staff too. The rooms are spacious and well appointed. The restaurant does the job. Good value for money

Amine the team were so good throughout our stay made it enjoyable and would definitely recommend a stay. Kamel at the bar also made our experience 5 star. We stayed for 4 nights and the trip was our first in Tunisia we will definitely be coming back in the near future

I  came here with a bit of apprehension having heard mixed reviews. I loved it, great value for money and the staff were truly amazing. Professional and courteous, always greeting everyone with a smile. Particular thumbs up for Meriam on the front desk, Jimmy in the bar and Amine of the hospitality team.

Very good stay, very good atmosphere, beautiful setting, the food was varied  Very nice and friendly bar staff  The animation at the top, Ghada animator very kind and with little care with children know her work well, the other animators are also very nice 😊

reviews.review_text: A horrible hotel dirty old towels all worn out very badly behaved staff in collusion with Tunis air these crooks we missed our departure on djerba because of Tunis air 3 hours late they told us total support we arrived at 9:10 p.m. not of catering not even a bottle of water there were 2 of us in the room we had a bath towel and a face towel I had to make a scandal to bring us back other towels at midnight and the receptionist told me say I'm not that you as a customer I don't have the time and first of all it's not you who pays for the room I was beside myself Tunis air gave us a voucher for 3 taxis because we were 6 people transiting Mr. receptionist who looks down on us who spoke to us very badly told us no night rate this is another price I will give you a taxi I concluded that he was in cahoots with the Tunis air agent the hotel charges the meal and breakfast although we neither ate nor had breakfast the rooms smell musty the carpet very dirty we had to open the windows because we couldn't breathe the bathroom very dirty one star and again he does not deserve it 0 star so Mr. manager your receptionist from September 1 speaks very badly to customers poorly mannered no respect for customers I do not recommend this Tunis air hotel and this hotel these crooks

He was unprofessional, nor did he have the attitude neither the look of guest reception. The room was dirty, I had to change it ( I found dirty sheets and hair on the bed) the 2nd room was also dirty. The room had AC but they turned it off, the same rude guy from the reception was telling guests that the season for AC has not started when it was very hot and humid in there. They also activate the keycard for 48h then you have to go ask them to reactivate it again. They said the system had a problem but I guess they were doing it on purpose to make people go to the reception just in case. The room service was not on a daily basis and the breakfast was terrible. I’ll never go back.

Hotel location is great near to Champion mall and to Monoprix supermarket. A strategic point near to the city center, those who enjoys walking will get 10 minutes to reach the main boulevard. Room is quite big enough and very clean, bathroom is very clean too. Staff are very helpful and polite. Overall the hotel deserves to be booked but some maintenance issues must be taken in consideration, reception lights, lifters and corridors.

This place is horrible. It’s very old and has not been maintained for way to long. The place stinks. Rooms are small, dark, dirty and smelly. Bed is horrible. Furniture is worn down. Service is a joke.

The room is big the internet was excellent the position is good but the hotel is dirty and so old the breakfast is poor also the dinner is bad and cold moreover the price is very expensive i had spent two nights then i competed my period in hammamat in hotel 5 star all inclusive with lowest price

name: Vincci Helios Beach
description: Vincci Helios Beach is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Midoun, offering a family-friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.The rooms offer a flat screen TV, and getting online is possible, as free internet access is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease.Vincci Helios Beach features a concierge. In addition, as a valued Vincci Helios Beach guest, you can enjoy a pool and free breakfast that are available on-site. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking.Given the close proximity to Ranch Adada Djerba (2.7 mi), guests of Vincci Helios Beach Hotel can easily experience one of Midoun's most popular landmarks.If you are looking for some good spots to eat nearby, you may want to check out Restaurant Lella Hadhria (0.7 mi) or Lamparo (1.2 mi), all of which are within walking distance of Vincci Helios Beach.Should time allow, Krokodilfarm Animalia and Phare de Taguermess (Lighthouse) are some popular attractions that are within walking distance.Enjoy your stay in Midoun!Read more

reviews.review_title: Not for families with young children
reviews.review_text: It is unfortunately a very old star hotel. Not really suitable for families with young children. The most desolate "playground" and mini club I've ever seen. The food is fine.  The service at the reception is very nice and always at pains.  Otherwise, there is actually no service here. It's self-service everywhere.   The beach is very nice, apart from the sad horses and camels that are exploited here. They stand all day in the blazing sun to entertain the tourists.  It would definitely have to renovate the pool area as the floor looks and feels like the tiles have been removed and simply no new ones laid.

The staff is really nice 😊  Quickly that the work of the hotel is done because the rooms of the bungalows are really in a sad state , we changed rooms 3 times 🤯and I farted a cable , it is very rare that we have a decent room at the first time , especially avoid the bungalows 9 view wc , restaurant and noisy pool and 6 view on a wall . Maria our ever adorable housekeeper .the security guard at the premium beach is very professional and friendly as well as the lifeguard . In short everyone is great 😊😊😊😊😊😊We return in October

Here's the holiday it's over, I keep a good experience of this stay  After coming in 2017 ,8 years after the hotel is still splendid, admittedly it is old but remains decent, I left a note to the manager to give him my impressions, thank you to him to greet us every day and to be attentive. A huge thank you to the team of animators who have been present every day and who make you have a good holiday ..choukran for the dances.... Good luck to you for the rest. I was able to go buggy and quad biking with kais present every day at the hotel and who is attentive for our requests, the quads are in front of djerba explore a shuttle takes you and takes you back to the hotel, I did 2 hours of solo buggy with a guide the top! Big up to everyone I've met here, employees, holidaymakers, animators Thanks to the vincci and inchalla team may be in August It's 5:30 the restaurant open so you can have lunch

Very nice hotel, we had a pleasant stay. Very good varied buffet. The water spaces for children are great with slides a little isolated.  A big thank you to the housekeepers for the cleanliness of the rooms and their kindness. Just a small remark: put more lighting at the level of the pétanque fields because the night falls quickly the fields are not very well lit. We will gladly return.

Restaurant top On the other hand old room Household not well done The staff unpleasant and especially at the reception the animators very well very nice space and very beautiful sandy beach the two pools very well and large on the other hand hotel isolated from any

First time in Tunisia it was amazing, but the hotel helped a lot! It was top frankly from start to finish thank you all for the welcome, for the service, for their kindness! Thank you very much it was great! And beautiful beach!!!!!

Very good stay in Djerba, very nice discovery for the first time in Tunisia. Top hotel, daily entertainment, family atmosphere, beautiful rooms. I recommend! Animators and helpful and friendly staff! Can't wait to get back!

Very welcome!! The animators are on top, there is nothing to say about it. The hotel is very clean, the rooms the same. The food is very promising, we ate super well. We don't regret it, and we'll come back! Thank you again.

I recommend personal at the top, impeccable service I will come back! The view from the rooms is beautiful, the beach of the hotel also had positive. The kids had a blast and so did I, the food is very good for an all-you-can-eat buffet

Very good hotel!! Clean, welcoming, very very helpful.  Very clean room and top service! Thanks to the animation team!  Super welcome and very good value for money The team speaks all languages is great!  And the animations are also great  Frankly thank you to them I have nothing to say I advise you. And beautiful beach!

This is my first time in Djerba with friends. We were warmly welcomed. The people here are all friendly and try the best. There are many animations, something for everyone. The rooms are always clean and the cleaning is totally sweet and always enchants the rooms with a smile. Jackson is totally affectionate and always has an open ear. The beach is fantastic, very clear sea. I would definitely come back. See you soon

reviews.review_title: The luxury of the 90s in the absence of maintenance and hygiene...
reviews.review_text: **Pros (the only ones):**   ✔ **A pleasant beach** – Well maintained and easy to access.   ✔ **Large spacious pool** – A major asset for relaxation.   ✔ **Quality doughnuts** – Fresh and tasty (special mention at snack).    **Cons (unfortunately dominant):**   ✖ **Cleanliness defective** – Dirt is palpable (floors, bedrooms, common areas).   ✖ **Minimalist investment** – Aging decoration, worn furniture, lack of maintenance.   ✖ **Mediocre customer experience** – Careless service, unworthy performance of a 4★.    **Verdict:**   This hotel **survives on its star**, but does not meet the international standards of a **real 4★**. It may be suitable for less discerning travellers, but anyone accustomed to similar establishments will be **disappointed**.    **Recommendation:** Avoid without a **complete renovation** and a **redesign of the service**.

Excellent stay The staff is attentive and customer service. Impeccable room Delicious meals  Swimming pool and sea and extra sun Animation in the evening ....what happiness I had a good time. The spa is to be done  Massage every day at very affordable rates

Pleasant stay with animators at the top .. Friendly hotel ..magnificent beach .. perfect room with sanitary at the top .. diversified meal.. and I recommend the SPA which is nice .. the staff is friendly and kind..

The hotel is wonderful, the staff are very attentive and helpful. Super professional and cheerful animation team all the time, highlighting the luffy who was amazing every day of our stay, super respectful and lively. About the food, I did not appreciate much but it is normal because we are not used to. There could be more variety. Lack of some maintenance in the smallest details, but outside it I highly recommend and was an incredible experience

name: Neptunia Beach
description: If you’re looking for a family-friendly hotel in Monastir, look no further than Neptunia Beach.Rooms at Neptunia Beach provide a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and guests can stay connected with free internet access.In addition, while staying at Neptunia Beach Hotel guests have access to a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and a sun terrace. reviews.review_text: The Neptunia is not the most luxurious hotel we have stayed in but by far the warmest one. The staff is exceptional: the reception, the maintenance, the restaurant, the entertainment team, the shop, everyone is taking care of you. Very decent restaurant with home fries every day, at the request of one of our daughters, the chef to upset the schedule to make a cuckoo!!!! A week of holidays at the top but too short in this establishment that we will surely return to. Cedric, Virginia, Margaux and Romane

reviews.review_title: My best All-Inc experience. Great hotel, Amazing Food!
reviews.review_text: Started well with a wonderful welcome when we arrived at 11pm... dinner and cold beer waiting for us. This hotel is beautiful, immaculate setting, super clean and lovely pool and beach area. Definitely best All inc buffet I've had anywhere, and the beer and wine are lovely. I'm veggie and although always ate so well cghef and the manager offered to cook me anything else I needed. Can't fault it.    The hotel has the usual family entertainment, but guests who may want a busy nightlife will be able to get a cheap taxi to Sousse or Monastir. The Hotel location is in a peaceful area but an ideal base to explore. We particularly liked Monasastir for cafe life and history and shopping!  Bedrooms have a balcony and full bathroom, English TV channels, and fridge. Bring a bottle for free cold water refils. We had the best sleep. Super comfy beds and quiet rooms.   The staff are lovely, particularly bar staff, dining room staff and receptionists.   The outstanding joy of this hotel is Mr Jaleel the manager. He genuinely cares so much about guest satisfaction and will go out of his way to resolve any  issues. He gets so upset when people come home and complain when he would easily resolve issues if only told about them. He's a credit to his hotel and Country.   I can't wait to return  to this peaceful hotel with beautiful beach and great food. Thank you so much to everyone at The Neptunia

We stayed at the hotel as a couple for ten days. We were delighted! The welcome great! Passing by jalel listening and a kindness. Hamed says “Loulou” kind and ready to do anything to help us.Adel and Captain Jimmy for the excursions! ♪ Kindness, both of you ♪ Full of good intentions ... Faouzi a very nice man and always there to see if everything is okay at the restaurant. Not to mention Moez and Ameni at the bar very smiling and very nice and to forget nobody the animators: bob , Leo, Nina, d’amine and Ryan always smiling, polite and extremely nice ... as well as all the people in the kitchen and the cleaning women always smiling, adorable.And the reception staff very nice! We enjoyed all the staff , food , location of the hotel ... everyone to the small care , very family and friendly hotel . We will be back with pleasure!!!

reviews.review_title: Small hotel good value for money!!
reviews.review_text: Very nice stay... clean and personal hotel with great care. A special mention to Adel who made us live a very pleasant trip. The food was buffet style so even the most difficult can find something to satisfy them  We will return as soon as possible
